title: Site Coordination Engineer - Digital Transformation (Oil and gas, Refining Pet-Chem)
description:
Who We Are

We are an international group of consultants united in the goal of helping our customers revolutionize their approach to engineering problems with the use of digital technologies. Combining automation and software development with “traditional” engineering, the companies we work with are able to obtain visibility into their own operations and control.


Who We’re Looking For

Though over 1,800 strong (and growing!), Radix operates like anything but a large company. When you join our company, you will help us:


When you join our company, you will help us as a Site Coordination Engineer:


Job Summary: General support for Digital Transformation Global Program Rollout. Implementation of state-of-the-art 3D Plant visualization and site reality capture. Supporting the training, and sustainment of the new “Visual way of Working”. This position would assist corporate technology and program management teams in the US, being the site liaison for the site project resources on the day-to-day activities involved. They should work closely with the project site representatives to ensure successful roll out and usage of new applications supported by the Change Management staff. Will likely support 2-3 sites.


Main Responsibilities :

· Attend monthly knowledge sharing meetings

· Help coordinate roll out activities

· Weekly review of models and data for each site to ensure proper organization, function testing of all integrations, performance, etc.

· Responsible for facilitating end user training of the new technology and ways of working. Including regularly scheduled training sessions, ad hoc training, and office hours for end user assistance for applications in projects scope.

· Assist site representatives with roll out and enabling of use cases

· Connection between site resources and additional project support resources

· Facilitate communications between project team and site resources to ensure good feedback in both directions.


Requirements and qualifications

· Exceptional communication skills

· Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, preferably in Chemical, Mechanical, or a related field.

· Must speak English clearly

· Preferable to have 3+ experience in O&G, Refining or Petrochemical manufacturing site or similar. Must be able to follow/keep up with technical conversations with engineers and technicians.

· Change management skills a plus

· Experience in 3D software, laser scanning, 3D modeling, digital enablement, etc. a plus

*Experience in project management tools like MS Project or Smart Sheets a plus


Benefícios:


  • Plano de Saúde + Odontológico
  • Médico da empresa
  • Gympass (+3 dependentes)
  • Auxílio creche até 3 anos
  • Licença maternidade e paternidade estendidas
  • Auxílio home office
  • VR e/ou VA
  • Day off de aniversário
  • Universidade Corporativa
  • Convênio com instituições de ensino e cursos de idioma
  • Programa de treinamentos internos
  • Plano de Incentivos atrelado à avaliação de Desempenho.


A Radix está sempre no topo das Melhores Empresas para se trabalhar porque:


  • Temos profissionais comprometidos, dedicados, curiosos e inovadores.
  • O espírito de equipe é a nossa maior força. Trabalhamos de forma cooperativa e sabemos que estamos juntos, remando na mesma direção.
  • Temos um ambiente diverso, que valoriza equidade e inclusão.
  • Nossa jornada de trabalho é flexível e em quase todos os projetos é possível trabalhar de qualquer lugar do Brasil.
  • Valorizamos o bem-estar e o cuidado com as nossas pessoas, com programas de apoio à saúde mental, psiquiatra e médico consultor disponíveis.

title: Desenvolvedor(a) de Software Mendix Sênior | 100% remota
description:
Qual o tamanho dos seus objetivos? Deseja novos desafios?


Então, vem para TQI!


A TQI é uma empresa de tecnologia e inovação que há mais de 30 anos, desenvolve soluções para suportar e alavancar os negócios de seus clientes no Brasil e no exterior.

Com escritórios em Uberlândia (MG) e em São Paulo (SP), e colaboradores em centenas de cidades, a TQI conquistou e mantém há mais de 6 anos o selo Great Place to Work (GPTW), e está no ranking 80+ do GPTW de Tecnologia, reforçando seu compromisso para promover um ambiente diverso e propício para inovação e alta performance.



Modelo de trabalho: Remoto

Modelo de contrato: PJ



Estamos em busca de um(a) Desenvolvedor(a) Sênior - Mendix para se juntar ao nosso time de TI e liderar a entrega de projetos inovadores. Se você é apaixonado por tecnologia, tem experiência em desenvolvimento low-code e deseja fazer parte de uma equipe dinâmica, esta oportunidade é para você!


Responsabilidades Principais:


  • Desenvolvimento Completo: Atuar durante todo o ciclo de vida do desenvolvimento de software para entregar produtos robustos e de alta qualidade;
  • Documentação e Soluções: Desenvolver fluxogramas, layouts e documentação para identificar necessidades e soluções;
  • Código de Qualidade: Escrever códigos bem estruturados, eficientes e testáveis;
  • Garantia de Qualidade: Desenvolver planos de verificação de software e procedimentos de garantia de qualidade;
  • Integração de Sistemas: Integrar componentes de software em um sistema totalmente funcional;
  • Especificações Técnicas: Produzir especificações técnicas que determinem a viabilidade da solução;
  • Suporte e Melhores Práticas: Apoiar membros da equipe no uso da plataforma Mendix e nas melhores práticas de desenvolvimento;
  • Aprendizado Contínuo: Disposição e capacidade para aprender continuamente sobre novas funcionalidades do Mendix, tendências de desenvolvimento low-code e evoluções na tecnologia da informação;
  • Análise e Melhoria: Analisar arquiteturas e aplicações existentes desenvolvidas em Mendix e propor melhorias para garantir robustez e escalabilidade;
  • Evolução Tecnológica: Participar na definição da estratégia de evolução tecnológica da empresa, incluindo a migração de soluções legadas.



Requisitos Necessários:


  • Experiência anterior como Engenheiro de Desenvolvimento de Software Low-Code (Mendix);
  • Graduação em Engenharia de Software, Ciência da Computação ou área relacionada;
  • Experiência em estruturar sistemas escaláveis e de alta disponibilidade, com ênfase em microsserviços, APIs, mensageria e integração com serviços externos;
  • Experiência com Docker/Kubernetes;
  • Experiência com práticas de DevOps e CI/CD em ambientes de grandes aplicações;
  • Experiência com cloud e serviços AWS;
  • Experiência com OO, padrões de projetos e princípios de desenvolvimento de software (S.O.L.I.D);
  • Experiência com frameworks e linguagens de programação Java e JavaScript;
  • Vivência com metodologias ágeis (Scrum, Kanban).

title: Líder Técnico - Foco em IA
description:
Na Stefanini, acreditamos no poder da colaboração. Co-criamos soluções inovadoras em parceria com nossos clientes, combinando tecnologia de ponta, inteligência artificial e a criatividade humana. Estamos na vanguarda da resolução de problemas de negócios, proporcionando impacto real em escala global.


Ao se juntar à Stefanini, você se torna parte de uma jornada global de transformação. Estamos empenhados em criar impacto positivo não apenas nos negócios, mas também na vida de nossos colaboradores. Se você procura uma oportunidade de crescimento profissional em uma empresa que valoriza inovação, respeito, autonomia e parceria, você encontra aqui!


Junte-se a nós e seja parte da mudança!



O que esperamos que você realize:


  • Ser uma referência técnica para o time de ciência de dados, atualmente composto por 8 profissionais
  • Desenhar soluções técnicas que atendam às necessidades do negócio, com foco em Inteligência Artificial.
  • Manter uma visão focada na entrega de resultados práticos e eficientes.
  • Provocar e implementar formas de trabalho mais práticas e ágeis.
  • Orientar o time para focar na entrega de valor, em vez de buscar a perfeição técnica.


O que precisamos que você tenha de conhecimento:


Requisitos essenciais:

  • Profunda experiência em Inteligência Artificial (IA), incluindo técnicas de aprendizado profundo (Deep Learning), redes neurais e modelos de linguagem.
  • Experiência sólida em Machine Learning, incluindo supervisão, não supervisão e aprendizado por reforço.
  • Conhecimento avançado em DataOps, com foco na automação de pipelines de dados e na gestão de ciclos de vida de modelos.
  • Familiaridade com frameworks de IA como TensorFlow, PyTorch, Keras, etc.
  • Habilidade em programação, preferencialmente em Python, e conhecimento de bibliotecas de ciência de dados como Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn.
  • Experiência com ferramentas de orquestração de modelos e monitoramento de performance.


Diferenciais:

  • Consultivo: Capacidade de entender e atender às necessidades do cliente e do negócio.
  • Proativo: Iniciativa para propor e implementar melhorias.
  • Analítico: Habilidade para analisar dados e tomar decisões baseadas em evidências.
  • Empático: Capacidade de se colocar no lugar dos membros do time e do negócio, promovendo um ambiente colaborativo e harmonioso.

title: Analista de Dados Sênior - Tribo Risco 360 - Squad Risk Analytics
description:
Estamos contratando | Analista de Dados Sênior - Tribo Risco 360 - Squad Risk Analytics


Estamos em busca de um(a) Analista de Dados Sênior para integrar nossa equipe de Risk Analytics. O(a) candidato(a) ideal será responsável por coletar, analisar e interpretar dados relevantes, com o objetivo de identificar padrões e anomalias que possam indicar riscos e fraudes. Além disso, este profissional terá a oportunidade de desenvolver produtos de dados inovadores e fornecer suporte estratégico/ tático e operacional aos demais times de risco, contribuindo para a melhoria contínua dos nossos processos de prevenção e mitigação. Se você é apaixonado(a) por análise de dados e deseja fazer a diferença em um ambiente dinâmico e desafiador, essa é a oportunidade perfeita para você!


Responsabilidades:


  • Coletar, processar e analisar grandes conjuntos de dados, utilizando técnicas de ETL/ ELT e análise estatística para identificar insights e padrões relevantes;
  • Desenvolver e implementar soluções analíticas avançadas para monitoramento/ alertas, previsão e identificação de tendências e que ajudem a empresa a tomar decisões baseadas em dados;
  • Identificar oportunidades para melhorar a eficiência e a eficácia dos processos de negócios;
  • Desenvolver relatórios e apresentações para comunicar insights de dados para a equipe, liderança e outras partes interessadas;
  • Trabalhar em colaboração com a equipe para garantir a qualidade e integridade dos dados.



Requisitos:


  • Capacidade analítica e atenção aos detalhes;
  • Boa comunicação e habilidade para apresentar dados de forma clara e concisa para diferentes públicos;
  • Experiência comprovada em análise de dados e manipulação de dados em larga escala;
  • Curiosidade e vontade de aprender sobre técnicas e ferramentas de análise de dados voltados para a área de risco e antifraude;
  • Sólido conhecimento em estatística, matemática e modelagem de dados;
  • Experiência em linguagens de análise de dados (SQL, Python e PySpark).
  • Experiência em visualização de dados (Looker, PBI ou Tableau);
  • Capacidade de trabalhar em equipe e colaborar com outras partes interessadas.



Diferenciais:


  • Experiência na área de Risco e Prevenção a Fraude
  • Experiência com modelos AI/ ML.
  • Experiência em BigQuery e Looker
  • Experiência com Airflow
  • Experiência em ferramentas como ClearSale, Konduto e Threatmetrix



Sobre o MagaluPay:


Somos parte de um dos pilares estratégicos do Magalu e desenvolvemos internamente as tecnologias de meios de pagamento do nosso ecossistema. Nos últimos anos, crescemos exponencialmente e nos tornamos uma das maiores empresas do setor. Oferecemos soluções como:

  • Contas digitais
  • Gestão de recebíveis
  • Split de pagamentos
  • Saques e transferências
  • Adquirência, cartão de crédito, crédito, Pix, e muito mais!


Nosso propósito é claro: digitalizar empresas e promover inclusão financeira, especialmente entre os empreendedores brasileiros.


Saiba mais sobre nós:

title: National Sales Partner (Iced Coffee, Energy Drinks)
description:
Only for Sales Managers/Directors in Brazil’s FMCG or beverage sector!!!


We are Europe’s largest and most modern beverage megafactory with an annual capacity of 10 billion cans. Our HELL energy drink brand is estimated to be the world’s 2nd largest , present in 60+ countries.

We now want to enter the Brazil's market, so we’re looking to connect with a few of the top distribution companies, from which we will select one for an exclusive partnership.


Your Job:

  • Introduce us the decision makers of 3–5 of the largest FMCG/beverage distributors in Brazil, using only your existing connections. That’s it - your job is done.
  • We will choose one of them for an exclusive partnership to launch our Energy Drink or Iced Coffee brands in Brazil.
  • Condition: You must already personally know the decision-makers at the largest FMCG/beverage companies. We’re not looking for cold-calling.


Your Reward:

  • It’s a Commission-only role with very high and long-term earning potential
  • Simply: once you introduce us to the right companies, your job is done - and you earn commission on every sale, forever (conditions apply)
  • Keep your current job – this is a side opportunity
  • You will work with one of Europe’s biggest beverage companies.


Apply only if you:

  • Have 5+ years of experience in FMCG/beverage sales
  • Personally know the top decision-makers at largest FMCG companies in Brazil.
  • Can communicate with us in English

title: Desenvolvedor Full Stack .net
description:
Company Overview

SEW is the #1 Energy and Water Cloud Platform, providing cloud-based Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) solutions for Digital Customer Engagement, Field Workforce Engagement, and Smart AI/Machine Learning to the Energy and Utility sector. We empower utilities to enhance customer service, optimize operational efficiency, and maximize return on investments through the SEW platform applications leveraging mobile, AI, Machine Learning, and Cloud technologies.

Searching for your dream job? At SEW, we strive to help our employees find passion and purpose. Join us in changing the way the world uses energy and water and become part of our innovative and talented team!


Position Overview

We are looking for a Mid Level Full Stack .Net Developer with good experience with C# and Angular to join our dynamic engineering team. In this role, you will design, develop, and maintain robust web and mobile applications that integrate seamlessly with SEW’s platform. The ideal candidate will be passionate about building scalable and efficient software solutions and thrive in a fast-paced, collaborative environment.


Key Responsibilities

Application Development:

  • Design, develop, and maintain scalable web and mobile applications using modern frameworks and technologies.
  • Build responsive front-end interfaces that deliver exceptional user experiences.
  • Develop efficient and secure back-end services and APIs.

Analysis and Reporting:

  • Perform thorough analysis of complex data and recommend actionable strategies.
  • Develop complex database queries in SQL/TSQL and NoSQL.
  • Translate client requirements to technical architectural specifications and communicate this to delivery teams and clients.

Collaboration:

  • Work closely with cross-functional teams, including product managers, designers, and other developers, to define and implement solutions.
  • Participate in code reviews to ensure high-quality software development.

System Optimization:

  • Optimize application performance to ensure scalability and reliability.
  • Troubleshoot, debug, and resolve technical issues promptly.

Innovation and Best Practices:

  • Define data architecture requirements for cross-product integration within and across cloud-based platforms.
  • Stay up to date with emerging technologies and industry trends.
  • Advocate for and implement best practices in software development, including testing, security, and CI/CD processes.
  • Write test plans and test cases to ensure application integrity is maintained.


Education and Experience Requirements

  • Educational Background: Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Data Engineering, or a related field.
  • Previous experience in software development and product deployment.
  • Hands-on experience with .Net Core, .Net Framework, Angular, Entity Framework, Git, Unit Tests and Pipelines.
  • Strong technical documentation skills.
  • Expertise in MySQL, Oracle, or MS SQL Server (SAP HANA is a plus).
  • Experience with cloud architecture, including AWS, Azure, and Google (SAP BTP is a plus).
  • Effectively translate data modeling and BI requirements into the design process.
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
  • Excellent human relations and documentation skills.
  • Strong ability to interpret customer and market insights and conduct data analysis.
  • Fluent English is required; Spanish is a plus.


Why Join SEW?

  • Be part of a mission-driven organization creating impactful solutions for the energy and water sectors.
  • Collaborate with a talented and innovative team on cutting-edge projects.
  • Enjoy opportunities for professional growth and skill development.
  • Work in a culture that values diversity, creativity, and collaboration.


SEW is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, pregnancy, age, national origin, disability status, genetic information, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.

title: Profissional Back end- Java SR
description:
Código da vaga: 47052


Sobre a BRQ Digital

Há 31 anos no mercado, a BRQ Digital Solutions se consolidou como uma das maiores empresas de transformação digital do país. Com uma plataforma de serviços end to end, oferecemos as mais eficientes e inovadoras soluções, tecnologias e metodologias, promovendo uma jornada de transformação para grandes marcas, de diferentes segmentos, no Brasil e no exterior.

Nossos 2.500 mil funcionários atuam no modelo de trabalho Anywhere Office e a empresa é destaque como um dos melhores lugares para trabalhar pelo GPTW e Glassdoor.

No nosso BRQ WAY temos a missão de conectar, transformar e empoderar cada um dos nossos profissionais, que por aqui são chamados de feras, para que todos tenham a chance de usar sua paixão para transformar o mundo com tecnologia! É isso que queremos, com nosso Programa de Diversidade e Inclusão trabalhamos com dois objetivos: equidade e inclusão, buscamos aumentar a participação dos grupos minoritários, quebrar os vieses inconscientes e expandir a conscientização sobre temas tão importantes para que todos sejam livres para serem quem são.

Vamos transformar juntos! Vem ser fera com a gente.



  • Ei , Desenvolvedor Back end SR, venha fazer parte de uma das maiores empresas de transformação digital do país!

Buscamos um #fera com espírito empreendedor e que sabe que é o verdadeiro protagonista do seu sucesso! Queremos em nosso time pessoas motivadas por desafios, constante evolução e, claro, que são apaixonadas por tecnologia e transformação!

  • Colaborar com a equipe para garantir a integração e funcionamento eficiente dos sistemas



Modelo 100% home office

CLT pela BRQ + Pacote de benefícios


- O que temos pra te oferecer?

Mais do que um plano de carreira !


A BRQ acredita que cada fera deve ser protagonista do seu crescimento, tendo autonomia para criar seu próprio plano de desenvolvimento profissional. Nosso plano de carreira é dividido em 4 pilares:


Carreira técnica: Você pode seguir a trilha de crescimento técnico, se o seu objetivo for se desenvolver cada vez mais em diferentes tecnologias. Oferecemos diversos treinamentos!

Carreira de Liderança: Você pode seguir a trilha e se tornar um líder, desenvolver pessoas, auxiliar na evolução profissional e pessoal e estimular o crescimento para o surgimento de novos talentos.

Experiência internacional: Estamos crescendo cada vez mais fora do Brasil e você tem possibilidade de atuar em projetos para outros países, ou diretamente nos países onde a BRQ tem sede.

Empreendedorismo: De funcionário para sócio! Temos o Innovation Hub, a Corporate Venture que investe em ideias de profissionais que tenham sinergia com nosso negócio.


- E os benefícios?

Plano de Saúde; Plano Odontológico; Seguro de Vida; Vale Refeição; Vale Alimentação; Horário Flexível; Home Office; Gympass, Telemedicina, Telenutrição, Canal de suporte emocional 24h e muito mais!


- Como é trabalhar na BRQ?

Temos um clima descontraído, diversos programas e eventos internos. Adoramos comemorar! E fazemos isso muito bem! Veja aqui no Youtube: youtube.com/brqdigitalsolutions

title: Arquiteto PEGA
description:
Descrição da vaga

A FCamara busca um(a) Arquiteto(a) PEGA Systems, para atuar em projetos estratégicos de arquitetura de soluções em parceria com um grande player do setor financeiro. O profissional será responsável por desenhar, evoluir e garantir a aderência de arquiteturas baseadas em PEGA, apoiando times de desenvolvimento na implementação de soluções escaláveis e otimizadas.

Buscamos um perfil com experiência em arquitetura de software, automação de processos (BPM) e integrações corporativas, capaz de conectar necessidades de negócio e tecnologia, assegurando a qualidade e eficiência das soluções implementadas.

Responsabilidades e atribuições


  • Desenhar soluções arquiteturais aderentes ao portfólio e às necessidades estratégicas do negócio;
  • Garantir a evolução contínua das aplicações e a adoção das melhores práticas de arquitetura PEGA;
  • Identificar oportunidades de reuso de componentes e otimização de soluções;
  • Realizar POCs para validar novas arquiteturas e aprimorar o portfólio de aplicações;
  • Apoiar desenvolvedores e times técnicos, garantindo a correta implementação das soluções propostas;
  • Documentar as soluções arquiteturais, incorporando boas práticas de governança e versionamento;
  • Atuar junto às squads ágeis, assegurando a aderência à arquitetura definida e a qualidade das entregas.


Requisitos e qualificações

Hard Skills:

  • Experiência comprovada como Arquiteto PEGA Systems ou liderança técnica em projetos com PEGA PRPC (PegaRULES Process Commander);
  • Sólido conhecimento em estratégias de BPM, Case Management e automação de processos com PEGA;
  • Experiência com Pega Integration Services, incluindo SOAP, REST, JMS e conectores de terceiros;
  • Conhecimento em PEGA Decisioning e Customer Decision Hub (diferencial);
  • Experiência em soluções de computação distribuída e arquitetura de microsserviços;
  • Conhecimento em mensageria (Kafka, RabbitMQ, ActiveMQ, etc.);
  • Experiência com bancos de dados relacionais (PostgreSQL, Oracle, SQL Server) e não relacionais (MongoDB, Cassandra, etc.);
  • Conhecimento em alguma linguagem orientada a objeto (Java, C#, Python, etc.);
  • Experiência com versionamento de código distribuído (Git, Bitbucket, etc.);
  • Familiaridade com DevOps e DevSecOps, incluindo práticas de CI/CD, infraestrutura como código e automação de deploys;
  • Conhecimento de modelagem de domínio e desenho de soluções escaláveis.


Soft Skills:

  • Proatividade: Antecipar desafios e propor soluções eficazes.
  • Responsabilidade: Garantir entregas com qualidade e alinhamento estratégico.
  • Colaboração: Trabalhar de forma integrada com times técnicos e de negócios.
  • Comunicação clara: Articular ideias complexas para diferentes públicos.
  • Resolução de problemas: Abordagem estratégica para superar desafios técnicos.
  • Pensamento crítico: Identificar oportunidades de melhoria e otimização contínua.
  • Accountability: Assumir a responsabilidade pelos resultados e impacto do projeto.
  • Visão sistêmica: Compreender o impacto das decisões na qualidade do produto e nos objetivos do negócio.
  • Mentoria: Compartilhar conhecimento e elevar o nível técnico da equipe.
  • Adaptabilidade: Ajustar-se rapidamente a mudanças e novas demandas.

title: UX/Product Design Lead
description:
Capgemini is seeking a highly motivated and detail-oriented UX/Product Design Lead for a top 10 US Insurance Carrier.


This role is responsible for designing engaging, intuitive, and effective digital experience. Provides a leadership role on projects to ensure project and user success by taking a broad view of the problem space that identifies root causes and actively works with business groups to resolve them. Collaborates with product owners, user research, and developers to problem solve through design exploration, ideation, and user validation


Our Client is one of the United States’ largest insurers, providing a wide range of insurance and financial services products with gross written premium well over US$25 Billion (P&C). They proudly serve more than 10 million U.S. households with more than 19 million individual policies across all 50 states through the efforts of over 48,000 exclusive and independent agents and nearly 18,500 employees. Finally, our Client is part of one the largest Insurance Groups in the world.


Responsibilities

  • Understand desires of client and create attractive product
  • Work closely with product managers and other teams (sales and marketing) to establish plan for product release Acknowledge budget and make plans in order to follow financial guidelines
  • Create product prototypes prior to creating final product
  • Adjust approach towards designs based on feedback provided


Requirements

  • Work Experience in This Field: 7-9 years
  • Experience with complex digital product design required
  • Online portfolio showcasing recent work demonstrating a strong sense of design clarity is required in order to be considered
  • English Proficiency: Fluent
  • Required Education: Bachelor's degree preferred
  • Online portfolio showcasing recent work required in order to be considered

Required Branches of Study

  • Design
  • Human-Computer Interaction, or related

Additional Preferred Branches of Study

  • Cognitive Psychology
  • Computer Science

Other Critical Skills

  • Product Design - Advanced
  • User Research - Advanced
  • Product Management - Advanced

Software / Tool Skills

  • Figma - Advanced
  • UI/UX - Advanced

Skills:

  • Human Centered Design
  • Problem-solving
  • Proactive in seeking out problems
  • Curiosity
  • Collaboration
  • Humility
  • Encouraging team participation and contribution
  • Focus on user outcomes
  • Super communication
  • Attention to detail


Benefits:


This position comes with competitive compensation and benefits package:

  • Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses
  • Comprehensive benefits package
  • Career development and training opportunities
  • Flexible work arrangements (remote and/or office-based)
  • Dynamic and inclusive work culture within a globally reknowned group
  • Private Health Insurance
  • Pension Plan
  • Paid Time Off
  • Training & Development


About Capgemini

Capgemini is a global leader in partnering with companies to transform and manage their business by harnessing the power of technology. The Group is guided everyday by its purpose of unleashing human energy through technology for an inclusive and sustainable future. It is a responsible and diverse organization of over 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong 55-year heritage and deep industry expertise, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to address the entire breadth of their business needs, from strategy and design to operations, fueled by the fast evolving and innovative world of cloud, data, AI, connectivity, software, digital engineering and platforms. The Group €22.5 billion in revenues in 2023.

description:

title: Senior QA Automation Engineer - Android
description:
Project Description:

Open Video project is focused on developing an OTT platform for one of the largest North American TV providers.


We are looking for a QA Automation Engineer to ensure software quality through automated testing. In this role, you will be responsible for creating, maintaining, and executing automated test cases, identifying and reporting bugs, and verifying fixes to ensure a seamless user experience.


The ideal candidate has a keen eye for detail, strong analytical skills, and excellent communication abilities, enabling effective collaboration with development and QA teams in a fast-paced environment.


Responsibilities:

• Review system specifications and define test requirements.

• Develop, execute, and maintain automated test cases, ensuring thorough validation.

• Identify, document, and track defects, collaborating with developers for resolution.

• Conduct functional, regression, and performance testing to assess software quality.

• Perform post-release validation and troubleshooting to ensure stability.

• Optimize testing processes, suggesting tools and techniques for efficiency.

• Work closely with cross-functional teams to maintain quality across the development lifecycle.

• Prepare test reports and provide insights on product reliability.


Mandatory Skills Description:

• Strong written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to document and report findings effectively.

• Experience in writing and executing test cases to ensure software quality.

• Strong problem-solving and analytical skills to identify, analyze, and resolve issues efficiently.

• Excellent planning, organizational, and follow-up abilities to manage tasks effectively.

• Hands-on experience in testing Android platforms, ensuring functionality and performance.

• Proficiency with version control and CI/CD tools, including Git, JIRA, Bitbucket, and Jenkins.

• Familiarity with Agile development methodologies and working in an Agile environment.

• Development experience with Java and test automation frameworks, including Appium, Selenium, and Webdriver.io.

• Knowledge and experience with essential debugging tools, such as Android Studio, Charles Proxy, and ADB logcat.


Nice-to-Have Skills Description:

• Experience with AndroidTV is a plus


Languages:

English: B2 Upper Intermediate

title: Investment Associate
description:
Role: Investment

Title: Associate

We are now hiring for a full-time junior position on the investment team at Next Billion Capital Partners (“Next Billion”). Please note: the location is fully flexible within Latin America, not just Brazil.


Next Billion is a technology investment firm, making private equity investments in high-growth, high-impact companies that are digitizing financial services, health, and education across the Global South with a focus on Latin America, Africa, and Southeast Asia. To learn more, please visit us at


We are seeking an exceptionally motivated and conscientious investment professional to join our team. As an Investment Associate, you will have the opportunity to be part of a tight-knit, fast-paced team, supporting investments as well as overall firm-building initiatives. This is a unique opportunity for a high-performing junior professional not only to continue building their investment track record but also to contribute meaningfully to the growth of an investment firm.


Responsibilities


Support the full investment process from sourcing through closing

  • Conduct market research and mappings of priority sectors
  • Support management of the investment pipeline
  • Participate in management calls and visits with potential investees
  • Develop financial models and create investment memos


Support portfolio management

  • Analyze portfolio performance and support monitoring of portfolio
  • Assist in financial and impact reporting
  • Support portfolio value creation


Support overall firm initiatives

  • Assist with investor relations and outreach
  • Support strategic projects and other operational activities


Qualifications


  • Undergraduate degree
  • 2-4 years of experience in private equity or investment banking
  • Advanced financial modeling and analysis, research skills
  • Strong communication and writing ability. Native or near-native English fluency (speaking and reading/writing); Spanish fluency a plus
  • Desire to work full time and across time zones; willingness to travel 
  • Demonstrated interest and/or background in emerging markets


Location & Compensation


  • Flexible working locations, with regular travel to US (East Coast) and/or Europe (Zurich) as well as deal-related travel to emerging markets
  • Compensation based on location and level of experience.


Please email your application to and include a short cover letter which includes your preferred location, your resume and deal sheet of past transactions, and your best investment idea for us in 1-2 paragraphs.

title: Senior Data Architect & Full-Stack Webmaster
description:
Senior Web & Data Architect – Engineering Education Excellence


Full-Time · Remote · Wordpress


Are you a web and data powerhouse who thrives on creating seamless user experiences, optimizing digital systems, and turning insights into action?

You've been looking for a role where you can actually use all those skills together, right?


At Practice PPE Exams, we help aspiring engineers get licensed up to 50% faster—and we're looking for a strategic, proactive, and skilled Web & Data Architect to make our platform smarter, faster, and more reliable. Your expertise will directly fuel our mission by merging technical mastery with proactive problem-solving and data-driven innovation.


This role is not for someone who waits for direction or just wants to check boxes. It's for someone who's obsessed with quality, sees problems before they happen, and enjoys owning the impact they create.


Your Mission

  • Drive growth through metrics by proactively identifying, collecting, and analyzing key user engagement, satisfaction, and financial metrics to inform data-driven decisions that grow revenue and reduce risk.
  • Anticipate and neutralize threats by proactively identifying potential system vulnerabilities and third-party service risks, and implementing contingency plans and backup systems for rapid recovery.
  • Elevate user experiences by maintaining and improving our web platform (WordPress, Beaver Builder, LearnDash, MemberPress) to ensure a polished, intuitive experience for over 5,000 annual users.
  • Support content and client communication workflows using tools like Drip (email automation), Stripe & PayPal (billing), Cloudflare (security and speed), and Vimeo (course hosting).
  • Test and experiment —launch A/B tests, interpret results, and apply findings to improve user conversion, retention, and satisfaction.
  • Automate excellence by using AI and automation tools (like n8n, bots, ChatGPT) to create internal efficiencies, support users, and speed up decision-making.
  • Collaborate with purpose by partnering with educators to transform technical content into compelling courses and resources.
  • Bonus if you bring video editing or graphic design skills , but they're not a must—we care more about your strategic thinking and systems expertise.


Who You Are

  • An A-player : quality-obsessed, optimistic, resourceful, and gritty with a passion for continuous learning and improvement.
  • A WordPress expert with deep, hands-on experience building and optimizing complex WordPress sites. Our entire platform runs on WordPress, so we need someone who doesn't just "know" WordPress, but has lived and breathed it through multiple projects and can troubleshoot issues in their sleep.
  • A data alchemist who loves designing tests, interpreting results, and translating numbers into growth strategies.
  • Ownership-driven —you don't shy away from accountability and take responsibility for outcomes, not just tasks.
  • Technically strong (CSS overrides, database tweaks, WordPress front/back end development) and business-minded (can interpret performance metrics and suggest improvements).
  • A strategic communicator with strong English skills who collaborates well and makes work fun for others.
  • An AI pioneer who's already built a few bots or automated workflows because, let's face it, you know that's where the industry is headed and you've been experimenting on your own anyway.
  • Someone who anticipates problems before they happen and plans accordingly .


Not a Fit If You:

  • Want to freelance on the side or split your focus
  • Struggle with feedback or miss deadlines
  • Wait for direction instead of taking initiative
  • Don't prepare for meetings
  • Avoid owning mistakes
  • Stick only to what's in your job description


Let's be honest - you're already scanning this list to see if there are any red flags about you, aren't you?


Your Toolkit

WordPress, Beaver Builder, LearnDash, MemberPress, Drip, Vimeo, Cloudflare, Stripe, PayPal, AI/automation platforms, & more. But, you’ve already looked up our tech stack on BuiltWith.com, haven’t you?


About Practice PPE Exams

We help engineers get their P.Eng. in Canada—up to 50% faster. Through online courses, tools, and expert support, we help 5,000+ clients/year move closer to their professional licence. Our mission is to empower engineers to grow their careers, income, and impact.


Why Join Us?

Shape the future of engineering education at a mission-driven company where your work directly impacts lives. Enjoy flexibility, ownership, and the thrill of solving high-stakes technical puzzles while helping engineers succeed—and have fun doing it. We offer a competitive salary and benefits to reward the expertise and results you bring to our team.


Apply now if you're ready to become the strategic architect behind thousands of engineering success stories!


You're still reading, which means you're probably a good fit – so what are you waiting for?

title: Técnico em Mecânica
description:
Descrição da Posição:

Estamos em busca de um Técnico em Mecânica para integrar nossa equipe! Se você tem experiência com cadastro e classificação de materiais em ambiente SAP, conhecimento em normas técnicas e especificação de materiais, essa pode ser a oportunidade ideal para você.


Principais Atividades:

  • Criação e alteração de classes de materiais, características, valores e dependências, hierarquia de classes, palavras-chaves, conceito, assim como a inserção e o ajuste de quaisquer outras informações necessárias às regras da estrutura de classificação, conforme a demanda de cadastro e de padronização de materiais, de grupos técnicos, além de revisões de classe e outras rotinas internas;
  • Monitoramento e controle de alterações e cadastros de NMs em classes prioritárias, tal como classes com status bloqueadas, padronizadas e afins;
  • Solicitação criação e atualização de Grupo de Mercadorias (GM).
  • Inclusão e alteração de relacionamento de classe e unidade de medida básica (UMB);
  • Identificação e eliminação de dados em duplicidades na estrutura de classes;
  • Inserção e disponibilização de mídias como fotos, documentos e especificações técnicas;
  • Correção de erros técnicos, ortográficos, caracteres, dependências e quaisquer outros referentes à estrutura de classificação e em conflito com regras do SAP;
  • Orientação quanto ao processo de classificação de materiais, de forma ampla e não exaustiva, como a verificação de necessidade de criação de classe, indicação de classe a ser utilizada, utilização de características e valores, bem como o suporte à toda a estrutura de classes e de relacionamentos de classificação no SAP;
  • Criação, inclusão e desvinculação de documentos de notas padrão;
  • Participação de reuniões ou encontros técnicos, de forma virtual, para execução das atividades de suporte técnico.
  • Análise e interpretação de normas técnicas nacionais e internacionais, a fim de apoiar esforços na manutenção do PDM e no correto cadastramento de materiais.
  • Criação, modificação, atualização, marcação e desmarcação de eliminação de material dos tipos existentes (não exaustivos, ZIBE, ZEIH e ZERP), de forma única no sistema SAP associado ao NCM correspondente, atendendo as regras e padrões da PETROBRAS.


Requisitos Indispensáveis:

  • Formação: Técnico em Mecânica.


Conhecimentos Indispensáveis:

  • Uso avançado em Office.
  • Uso de SAP BW e SAP S/4Hana- módulo MM.
  • Conhecimento de normas técnicas nacionais e internacionais.
  • Conhecimento intermediário da língua inglesa.


Requisitos Desejáveis:

  • Uso de Business Intelligence (BI) como Spotfire, Power BI etc.
  • Métodos ágeis e sua aplicação nas rotinas de trabalho (Kanbam, Scrum etc.).
  • Experiência comprovada em atividades de classificação de materiais e/ou engenharia de manutenção na indústria de Petróleo e Gás.


Informações adicionais:

  • Local de atuação: Home Office;
  • Regime: CLT / 44h semanais;
  • Salário: R$ 3.509,56;
  • Vale Alimentação: R$ 28,00 por dia útil trabalhado;
  • Plano de Saúde (Abrangente apenas ao colaborador);
  • Seguro de vida.

title: UX/UI Designer
description:
Sobre a Empresa


Há mais de 20 anos mercado, somos uma consultoria estratégica de Inovação e Transformação Digital. Nossa especialidade é impulsionar as demandas de nossos clientes, integrando processos, pessoas e tecnologia de alta performance.

title: Scrum Master Jr/Pl.
description:
Na Stefanini, acreditamos no poder da colaboração. Co-criamos soluções inovadoras em parceria com nossos clientes, combinando tecnologia de ponta, inteligência artificial e a criatividade humana. Estamos na vanguarda da resolução de problemas de negócios, proporcionando impacto real em escala global.

Ao se juntar à Stefanini, você se torna parte de uma jornada global de transformação. Estamos empenhados em criar impacto positivo não apenas nos negócios, mas também na vida de nossos colaboradores. title: DevOps Engineer
description:
Job Title:

DevOps Engineer


Job Summary:

We are seeking a skilled Engineer to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing and supporting cloud-based solutions, providing consultation on cloud development work, and supporting containerised applications.


Key Responsibilities:

· Guide teams in designing, building, testing, and deploying changes to cloud-based applications.

· Identify and automate manual processes at scale with scripts and AWS Lambda functions.

· Maintain and improve applications hosted in AWS - particularly containerized applications in EKS.

· Conduct testing and continuous improvement practices to ensure the performance and reliability of applications.

· Support application users across the organization, and perform troubleshooting and resolve application issues in a timely manner.

· Implement and manage Infrastructure-as-Code with CloudFormation and AWS CDK with Python.

· Develop and maintain Kubernetes clusters and Helm charts for container orchestration.

· Ensure observability and monitoring of systems using appropriate tools.

· Manage hybrid file storage solutions across on-premise and the cloud.

· Deploy and manage AWS EKS clusters, database, compute and other associated AWS resources with Infrastructure-as-Code.

· Design and implement event-driven workflows and serverless applications to meet business requirements.

· Handle on-demand data archiving requests from labs of different geo-locations.

· Conduct permission configuration and system maintenance for a data archival solution.

· Maintain and improve documentation for storage solution architecture, configurations, processes, and service records.

· Provide customer support for data customers who request access to archived data.

· Migrate resources and AWS accounts across environments/accounts, and identify the most suitable process to do so according to the business requirements and existing resource configurations.


Required Skills and Qualifications:

· Familiarity with Linux computing environments.

· Experience writing YAML, JSON, Python and SQL and using SDKs such as Boto3.

· Experience with storage systems management/maintenance.

· Working experience with file system protocols such as SMB and NFS.

· Experience with managing access control (Windows ACL) for users/groups.

· Hands on experience with AWS services such as S3, IAM, Storage Gateway, EC2, EFS, EBS, EKS, RDS, CloudFormation, KMS, SNS, Step Functions, Athena, Glue, DynamoDB, Lambda and Networking services.

· Experience with Infrastructure-as-Code development and deployments.

· Hands on experience with storage, compute and database tools and services.

· Experience with Kubernetes and Helm for container orchestration.

· Knowledge of observability and monitoring practices.

· Experience with CI/CD tools such as GitHub Actions and ArgoCD.

· Proficiency in deploying and managing AWS EKS clusters.



All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or status as a protected veteran.

title: Sales Manager
description:
Today’s world faces increasing security challenges. Threat actors are everywhere—often invisible, virtual, and highly sophisticated. Traditional methods to prevent and investigate crime are no longer enough… Technology is evolving at an unprecedented pace. Those who engage in illicit activities know this and are taking advantage. We know it too.

For nearly 30 years, the incredible minds at Cognyte around the world have worked closely together, applying their expertise to keep up with constantly evolving technological and security challenges. Our mission is to help make the world a safer place with leading investigative analytics software solutions.

We are currently looking for a Sales Manager - Threat Intelligence Analytics to join our sales team in LATAM to drive the threat intelligence analysis business line sales.

So, if you rock at direct and channel sales and want in on the action, let’s talk!


As a Cognyter you will:

  • Developing and growing the company business in the assigned territory and segment.
  • Managing, leading, and building a sales funnel.
  • Leading sales activities for enterprise customers in different market segments, while executing end-to-end lifecycle sales from opportunities to a successful close.
  • Bringing new customers, partners and establishing relationships to drive sales.
  • Generating and executing an accurate, timely, and professional sales strategy plan, and account planning.
  • Providing management with accurate and timely reporting of activities including weekly and monthly sales forecasts, the status of the sales pipeline and results of prospecting activities.


For that mission you’ll need:

  • Sales experience (minimum 5 years) of SaaS solutions in the cybersecurity industry, including account management, account planning and pipe generation with enterprise organizations.
  • Experience selling SaaS solutions, with expertise in the threat intelligence, EASM, and DRP domains.
  • Comprehensive experience with both direct sales and indirect sales through integrators and partners, leveraging a strong network of relationships.
  • First-rate closing techniques with a proven history of high dollar sales success within the assigned territory and market segments.
  • Excellent listening, verbal, and written communication skills with ability to interface with all levels of an organization.
  • Prior experience with reading and analyzing RFPs, preparing, writing, and submitting detailed responses designed to win business.
  • Fluency in English; other languages (e.g. Spanish) is an advantage.
  • Excellent interpersonal skills.
  • The position requires frequent travel in the associated territory.


Remember: When you're curious enough, you don't need to check every box to apply. Be in touch!

title: Desenvolvedor Fullstack - Exclusiva PCD
description:
A Getronics é líder global em soluções de tecnologia, com uma equipe de mais de 4.000 colegas em 22 países, fornecendo serviços abrangentes de ponta a ponta em todo o mundo. Temos o compromisso de oferecer um atendimento excepcional ao cliente, para permitir que eles se concentrem em seus principais pontos fortes, enquanto confiam suas necessidades de TI à Getronics. Temos uma oportunidade incrível para você se juntar à nossa equipe, na seguinte vaga: Desenvolvedor Fullstack - Remoto.


O que oferecemos a você

- Assistência médica sem desconto para titulares;

- Assistência odontológica sem desconto para titulares;

- Cartão flex tanto para alimentação quanto refeição;

- Auxílio home office para vaga remota;

- Vale transporte para posições presenciais ou híbridas;

- Seguro de vida;

- Desconto em terapia: plataforma de apoio psicossocial;

- Parceria com instituições de ensino;

- Parceria com escolas de idiomas;

- Programa de subsídio para aulas de inglês;

- Programa de indicações: prêmio para indicações bem-sucedidas; - Licença maternidade estendida de 180 dias e a licença paternidade de 20 dias;

- Treinamento completo fornecido como parte de um processo de indução robusto, incluindo oportunidades de desenvolvimento contínuo com nossa plataforma de aprendizado online NorthStar, Learning e Udemy, que possui mais de 80.000 cursos disponíveis;

- GetVibes - nosso programa de escuta ativa que nos permite conectar e ouvir feedback de todos os colegas, e como empresa, trabalhamos juntos para elaborar planos de ação para melhorar e desenvolver continuamente a Getronics!


O que esperar dessa posição:

Atuação no desenvolvimento e melhorias de sistemas bancários.


O que esperamos de você:

Frontend:

  • ✅ AngularJS, Angular 8 e 12
  • ✅ HTML, CSS, JavaScript
  • ✅ Git e GitHub

Backend:

  • ✅ Java 6, 8 e 11
  • ✅ Node.js
  • ✅ Quarkus
  • ✅ Microsserviços e APIs REST
  • ✅ Swagger

DevOps e Infra:

  • Docker e Kubernetes
  • Maven


O que fazer em seguida:

  • Caso você seja a pessoa que estamos procurando, aguarde nosso contato para te conhecermos melhor e siga as instruções durante o processo seletivo. Se você gostaria de fazer alguma pergunta sobre nossas vagas, sobre a Getronics como empresa ou qualquer outra coisa, por favor, não hesite em entrar em contato. A equipe de RH estará disponível no e-mail

title: AI/ML Engineer
description:
About the company:

Avenue Code is the leading software consultancy focused on delivering end-to-end development solutions for digital transformation across every vertical. We’re privately held, profitable, and have been on a solid growth trajectory since day one. We care deeply about our clients, our partners, and our people. We prefer the word ‘partner’ over ‘vendor’, and our investment in professional relationships is a reflection of that philosophy. We pride ourselves on our technical acumen, our collaborative problem-solving ability, and the warm professionalism of our teams.

Avenue Code has been believing in and promoting plurality actions for over 10 years, understanding that recognizing differences and fostering a safe environment, employment opportunities, representation, and support are the best ways to promote an increasingly equitable culture.


About the opportunity:

Estamos em busca de um(a) Machine Learning Engineer altamente qualificado(a) e inovador(a) para projetar e desenvolver soluções de ponta na área de Natural Language Processing (NLP) e Large Language Models (LLMs). Essa posição exige expertise em advanced prompt engineering, sistemas de Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) e desenvolvimento de chatbots, além de um forte foco em práticas de segurança aplicadas a LLMs. O(a) candidato(a) ideal irá combinar profundo conhecimento técnico com criatividade para impulsionar o desenvolvimento de aplicações inteligentes, seguras e de alto desempenho baseadas em IA.


Responsibilities:

  • Projetar, implementar, testar e iterar prompts sofisticados para LLMs.
  • Aplicar técnicas avançadas de prompt engineering como few-shot learning e chain-of-thought.
  • Construir e otimizar pipelines de dados para sistemas RAG, estruturando dados textuais para recuperação eficiente.
  • Gerenciar embeddings e vector databases (ex: FAISS, Pinecone, Weaviate).
  • Integrar mecanismos de retrieval com modelos generativos para respostas contextuais.
  • Monitorar a performance de sistemas RAG, com foco em precisão e qualidade.
  • Implementar medidas de segurança contra prompt injection, jailbreaking e data leakage em sistemas LLM.
  • Desenvolver e implementar abordagens para sanitização de entrada e validação de saída.
  • Projetar, desenvolver e manter chatbots e assistentes virtuais utilizando Google Dialogflow (CX e ES).
  • Integrar chatbots com sistemas backend, APIs e canais como web e apps móveis.
  • Aplicar técnicas de NLP como NER, classificação de texto, sumarização e topic modeling.
  • Realizar fine-tuning de modelos como BERT, GPT e T5 com dados de domínio.
  • Implantar modelos de NLP em produção seguindo práticas de MLOps.


Required Qualifications:

  • Experiência em Data Science e modelagem preditiva.
  • Experiência com prompt engineering e LLMs.
  • Conhecimento em RAG e vector databases (ex: FAISS, Pinecone, Weaviate).
  • Prática com Google Dialogflow (CX e ES).
  • Familiaridade com NLP e técnicas como NER, classificação de texto, sumarização e topic modeling.
  • Habilidade em Python.
  • Conhecimento de MLOps.


Nice to have skills:

  • Experiência com ferramentas de data lineage (ex: Informatica, Collibra).
  • Experiência com system disposition e projetos de migração.
  • Conhecimento de data quality frameworks.
  • Habilidades em gestão de projetos (Project Management).


Avenue Code reinforces its commitment to privacy and to all the principles guaranteed by the most accurate global data protection laws, such as GDPR, LGPD, CCPA and CPRA. The Candidate data shared with Avenue Code will be kept confidential and will not be transmitted to disinterested third parties, nor will it be used for purposes other than the application for open positions. As a Consultancy company, Avenue Code may share your information with its clients and other Companies from the CompassUol Group to which Avenue Code’s consultants are allocated to perform its services.

title: Oracle Transportation Management (OTM) Consultant
description:
**MUST BE FLUENT IN ENGLISH; PLEASE APPLY WITH A RESUME WRITTEN IN ENGLISH TO DEMONSTRATE FLUENCY


Title: OTM Consultant

Location: Remote – sitting in Brazil

Duration: 8-month Contract w/ possible extensions (through end of 2025)

Pay Rate: $8-20/hr USD (may be some flexibility here based on experience)


Qualifications:

  • 7+ years of hands-on experience with Oracle Transportation Management (OTM), including at least 2 full lifecycle OTM upgrade projects.
  • Proven experience specifically with OTM upgrades to version 6.5.x or similar major releases.
  • Strong technical and functional expertise in OTM architecture, workflows, configurations, and integration points.
  • Experience with Oracle database administration tasks supporting OTM, including schema updates, performance tuning, and backup/recovery processes.
  • Familiarity with infrastructure aspects such as server migrations, and middleware configurations related to OTM environments.
  • Proficiency in SQL, PL/SQL, and creating/optimizing stored procedures.
  • Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and troubleshooting skills.
  • Ability to work independently, manage competing priorities, and deliver in a fast-paced environment.
  • Strong communication skills to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.
  • Exposure to working in large-scale logistics, transportation, or supply chain environments.
  • Experience with performance testing and capacity planning for OTM environments.


Job Description:

We are seeking a highly skilled Technical Functional OTM Specialist to support our Oracle Transportation Management (OTM) upgrade across three environments. The goal is to complete the upgrade by the end of the year. This role involves developing new functionality, testing it thoroughly, and addressing updates and new versions.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Lead the end-to-end OTM upgrade process across three environments, targeting completion by year-end.
  • Develop and implement new functionalities in OTM aligned with business requirements.
  • Conduct thorough testing of all enhancements, customizations, and system upgrades.
  • Create, review, and optimize stored procedures, SQL queries, and database objects to ensure system performance and integrity.
  • Collaborate with infrastructure teams to address database, server, and integration layer requirements for the upgrade.
  • Ensure seamless handling of updates, patches, and new versions, maintaining system stability and performance.
  • Troubleshoot and resolve technical and functional issues post-upgrade.
  • Provide documentation, training, and knowledge transfer to internal teams as needed.

title: Python Tech Lead - Remote
description:
Recognized as the leading software development company in the Americas, our client offers 100% remote modality and an excellent work environment in which employees can thrive, work in multicultural teams, with flexible schedules and endless growth opportunities.


About the Role:

We are looking for Python Tech Leads to join our Development team and participate in different projects made up of multicultural teams distributed throughout the world. We are looking for proactive people, team players passionate about programming in this language and oriented to provide the best experience to the end user. This is an excellent opportunity for those professionals looking to develop in one of the fastest growing companies in the industry!


These developers will face numerous technical challenges, so they must use current technologies, get involved in the mobile world, web applications, devices, etc.


Main Activities:

- Work closely alongside their Engineering and Business Stakeholders to support the delivery of the project.

- Be able to manage your time effectively to focus on coding as well as supporting junior members.

- Integrate with the DevOps team to maintain tasks.

- Make architectural decisions keeping the future of a growing business in mind.


Requirements:

- Solid practical experience in Python and Django development.

- Experience in development with object-oriented programming is desirable.

- Previous experience in development using other programming languages.

- Good skills with XML and relational databases (Oracle / MS SQL / MySQL).

- Experience with OOD.

- Strong professional experience working with large data structures (including XML) and algorithms.

- A University Degree in systems is a plus.

- Advanced English level.


Benefits:

- 100% remote work.

- Flexible hours - make your own schedule!

- Diverse and multicultural work environment.

- Paid parental leave, vacation & holidays.

- Hardware setup for you to work from home. 

- Excellent compensation — well above the market average.

- Extensive opportunities for growth and professional development thanks to our mentoring system.


Enjoy the opportunity to have a dynamic lifestyle, better health, and wellness. Find renewed passion in your job, improve your productivity, and benefit from attractive growth opportunities for your career.


If you are interested in being part of a team composed of the best professionals and working 100% goal-oriented in an innovative environment, but with the structure and resources of a multinational market leader, do not hesitate to apply!

title: Gestor de tráfego pago
description:
A Consoni está expandindo a operação e estamos buscando novos parceiros para compor nosso time.

A vaga em questão é para o cargo de ''Gestor(a) de Tráfego''. 

O modelo de contratação é PJ e o trabalho é 100% remoto.


IMPORTANTE:

Aplique apenas se tiver MUITA VONTADE DE CRESCER, MUITA VONTADE EM ENTREGAR RESULTADO, TIVER PERFIL DE FAZER ACONTECER E RESOLVEDOR DE PROBLEMA, NÃO TIVER MEDO DE TRABALHO.

Responsabilidades:


 - Desenhar junto com o Head de Tráfego a estratégia do tráfego macro de cada cliente;

 - Acompanhar individualmente as contas de cada clientes propondo melhorias e apontando possíveis GAPs, mitigando Eventos Críticos;

 - Dar clareza das estratégias e entregáveis de cada cliente com demais gestores operacionais;

 - Suprir o Head de Tráfego com informações de melhorias necessárias para nas contas, apontando possíveis soluções:

 - Participar dos acompanhamento com os clientes;

 - Elaborar, junto ao gestor de tráfego, o debriefing dos clientes e discutir com o Head antes da apresentação final com o cliente;

 - Responder no grupo dos clientes questões mais técnicas, quando marcado por alguém do time e recorrer ao Head para assuntos mais críticos e estratégicos;

 - Garantir que os Dashs estejam atualizados;

 - Acompanhar os KPIs dos gestores de tráfego afim de mitigar entregas abaixo do esperado;

 - Garantir que os processos e projetos estejam sempre dentro do SLAs, e buscar estar sempre “um passo” à frente do cliente;

 - Garantir que os documentos como checklists, cronogramas, FUPs, acompanhamentos sejam sempre entregues dentro do prazo para o suporte enviar para cliente;

- Operacionalizar tráfego em contas determinadas.

title: SAP Basis Consultant
description:
Como Consultor SAP Basis Sênior, você será responsável por garantir a infraestrutura técnica e a estabilidade da plataforma SAP durante a migração para o ambiente S/4HANA Cloud , atuando como pilar fundamental na transição tecnológica do projeto.


Responsabilidades:

  • Gerenciar e suportar a arquitetura técnica SAP , incluindo instalação, configuração e manutenção dos ambientes S/4HANA Cloud.
  • Planejar e executar atividades de migração técnica (pré e pós-migração), colaborando com equipes funcionais e de segurança.
  • Monitorar performance e disponibilidade dos sistemas SAP , realizando ajustes de tuning e garantindo continuidade operacional.
  • Gerenciar transportes, autorizações, upgrades e correções (OSS Notes) no landscape SAP.
  • Assegurar integração técnica entre SAP e soluções externas , como middlewares, bases de dados e sistemas legados.
  • Participar ativamente de testes técnicos, cut-over e estratégias de go-live , garantindo a prontidão do ambiente.


Perfil ideal:

  • Mínimo de 8 anos de experiência como consultor técnico SAP Basis.
  • Experiência comprovada em pelo menos 3 projetos de implementação ou migração para SAP S/4HANA Cloud , preferencialmente greenfield.
  • Conhecimentos sólidos em instalação, upgrade e tuning de ambientes SAP HANA e S/4HANA.
  • Experiência com integração técnica de SAP com outros sistemas, via SAP PI/PO, SAP Cloud Connector, API Gateway ou outros.
  • Domínio em gestão de permissões, roles e políticas de segurança SAP .
  • Experiência com soluções em cloud (AWS, Azure, GCP) será um diferencial.


Localização: Brasil (preferencialmente em São Paulo)

Modalidade: Flexível

Tipo de projeto: Migração

Idioma requerido: Português (fluente), outros idiomas serão um diferencial


Interessados enviar e-mail para com sua taxa (rate) ou aplicar diretamente .

title: Especialista Genesys Cloud
description:
Na Stefanini, acreditamos no poder da colaboração. Co-criamos soluções inovadoras em parceria com nossos clientes, combinando tecnologia de ponta, inteligência artificial e a criatividade humana. Estamos na vanguarda da resolução de problemas de negócios, proporcionando impacto real em escala global.


Ao se juntar à Stefanini, você se torna parte de uma jornada global de transformação. Estamos empenhados em criar impacto positivo não apenas nos negócios, mas também na vida de nossos colaboradores. Se você procura uma oportunidade de crescimento profissional em uma empresa que valoriza inovação, respeito, autonomia e parceria, você encontra aqui!


Junte-se a nós e seja parte da mudança!


Estamos em busca de um profissional altamente qualificado para se juntar à nossa equipe e atuar na implementação, gestão e otimização de soluções de contact center baseadas na plataforma Genesys Cloud. Se você tem paixão por transformar a experiência do cliente e está pronto para contribuir com seu conhecimento em soluções de telecomunicações, essa vaga é para você!


Responsabilidades:

  • Implementação, customização e integração de soluções Genesys Cloud.
  • Garantir a performance e a alta disponibilidade da plataforma para otimizar a experiência do usuário.
  • Análise de requisitos técnicos e elaboração de soluções inovadoras e escaláveis para o cliente.
  • Suporte técnico avançado, troubleshoot e otimização contínua dos sistemas.
  • Trabalhar em estreita colaboração com equipes de TI e outras áreas para garantir a entrega de projetos de alto impacto.
  • Contribuir para a evolução de processos e automações dentro da plataforma.


Requisitos:

  • Experiência sólida com a plataforma Genesys Cloud.
  • Conhecimento profundo em integração de APIs, administração e configuração de soluções em cloud.
  • Expertise em ambientes de contact center e telecomunicações.
  • Capacidade de diagnosticar e resolver problemas técnicos de forma eficiente.
  • Habilidade para trabalhar em equipe multidisciplinar e com clientes.
  • Desejável certificação Genesys Cloud ou em outras soluções de contact center.
  • Mandatório inglês avançado

Diferenciais:

  • Experiência em projetos de grande escala ou com múltiplos clientes.
  • Conhecimento em integração com sistemas CRM e outras plataformas de comunicação.
  • Facilidade para lidar com projetos desafiadores e ambiente de mudanças rápidas.


Atuação em home office em horário comercial


Informações adicionais

O que te oferecemos:


Vale Alimentação ou Vale Refeição;

‍ Desconto em cursos, universidades e instituições de idiomas;

Academia Stefanini - plataforma com cursos online, gratuitos, atualizados e com certificado;

Mentoring;

Auxílio Creche;

Clube de vantagens para consultas e exames;

Assistência Médica;

title: Platform Engineer
description:
Senior Software Engineer (FinTech)

Location: Brazil, Peru, Chile, or Argentina (Remote)

Employment Type: Full-Time

Compensation: $120,000 – $150,000 USD annually


LMK Recruiting Solutions is conducting a search on behalf of a fast-growing, venture-backed FinTech company on a mission to modernize outdated infrastructure and streamline complex financial processes. We're looking for a Senior Software Engineer who thrives in a startup environment and is excited to help shape the core product and architecture of a rapidly scaling platform.

This role is fully remote, and candidates must be located in Brazil, Peru, Chile, or Argentina .


Responsibilities:

  • Lead the development of scalable backend services and APIs using modern technologies.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams across engineering, product, and design to build features that directly impact users.
  • Contribute to architectural decisions, code reviews, and overall technical strategy.
  • Own and improve the reliability, performance, and security of key systems.
  • Maintain high engineering standards and mentor junior developers when needed.


What We're Looking For:

  • 5+ years of professional software engineering experience.
  • Strong backend development experience using modern frameworks (e.g., Node.js, Go, Python).
  • Experience working in fast-paced, high-growth startups or FinTech environments is a plus.
  • Solid understanding of API design, data structures, and distributed systems.
  • Excellent communication skills and the ability to work independently in a remote-first culture.


Why Apply?

  • Join a highly driven team working to transform a legacy industry through cutting-edge tech.
  • Competitive compensation: $120,000 – $150,000 USD annually.
  • Work remotely from anywhere in Brazil, Peru, Chile, or Argentina.
  • Opportunity to make a major impact at an early stage of growth.


If you're looking for a challenging and rewarding opportunity with a company that values ownership, innovation, and impact, we’d love to hear from you.

Apply confidentially via or email

title: Node Developer - Remote
description:
At INDI, we're passionate about empowering individuals and businesses worldwide. Our cutting-edge recruiters connect leading companies with top talent, fostering a dynamic environment where innovation thrives. Join us in shaping the future of work.


Overview of the Role:


Are you ready to join a dynamic Development team and take on diverse projects with multicultural teams worldwide? We're seeking Node Developers who are proactive, collaborative team players passionate about programming and dedicated to delivering exceptional user experiences. This is an exciting opportunity to grow with one of the fastest-growing companies in the industry!


Responsibilities:


Q: What will you do as a Node Developer?

A: You'll architect Bandit backend systems using the best practices available. You'll implement and iterate on features swiftly and strategically, adapting to the demands of our fast-paced startup environment.


Q: How will you contribute to API design and implementation?

A: You'll play a crucial role in designing, extending, and implementing APIs to ensure robust functionality and seamless integration across platforms.


Q: How do you maintain engineering quality?

A: You'll uphold high standards through rigorous code reviews, comprehensive unit testing, and insightful analytics to drive continuous improvement.


Q: What role does automation play in your work?

A: Automating processes and developing tools will be key to enhancing engineering efficiency and productivity.


Q: How will you influence engineering processes?

A: You'll define and refine engineering processes to support successful product launches and releases, ensuring our solutions meet the highest standards.


Q: How can you help us expand our engineering team?

A: Conducting technical interviews will allow you to contribute to the growth of our world-class engineering team, bringing in top talent to drive our success.


Requirements:


Q: How much experience is required?

A: You should have a minimum of 5 years of experience in Node development, demonstrating your expertise and proficiency in the field.


Q: What specific expertise is needed in addition to Node development?

A: Experience in Video and HLS (HTTP Live Streaming) will be essential for addressing the diverse technical challenges you'll encounter.


Q: What language skills are necessary?

A: Proficiency in advanced English is required to effectively communicate and collaborate with our global teams and clients.


Benefits:

• Flexibility: Choose where and how you work for enhanced creativity and innovation.

• Tailored Compensation: Personalize your earnings to suit your financial goals.

• Tech-Driven Tools: Access cutting-edge resources for seamless collaboration and productivity.

• Autonomous Workflow: Take control of your schedule to achieve work-life balance.

• Well-being: Enjoy generous leave policies for rest and rejuvenation.

• Diversity & Inclusion: Thrive in a diverse and inclusive environment.

• Collaboration: Engage with industry leaders for collective growth.

• Development: Access mentorship and growth opportunities for continuous advancement.


If you are interested in being part of a team composed of the best professionals and working 100% goal-oriented in an innovative environment, but with the structure and resources of a multinational market leader, do not hesitate to apply!

title: Junior Hotel Account Manager (Natal)
description:
Keytel is the world’s first alliance of independent hotels , with more than 3,000 affiliated hotels in 80 countries. We believe in the viability and success of the independent hotel, which is why we have developed our own hotel acceleration model that combines strategic consulting and technology, focusing on making hotels competitive without giving up their identity.


At Keytel, we want to be the trusted partner of independent hotels, and to fulfill this purpose, we are looking for committed people, open to change, customer-oriented, and with a long-term vision—people who want to contribute to and build the future of the sector alongside our team.

If you’re already wondering how to do that, keep reading about our Account Manager position.




What will your day-to-day look like?



The main objective of this position is, reporting to the management team, to define goals, manage and acquire a client portfolio, and execute the expansion plan for the assigned market.



Your main responsibilities will be:


  • Build strong business relationships with the hotels in your portfolio.
  • Optimize inventory, availability, and the competitiveness of rates offered through the Reservations Center.
  • Negotiate conditions with the goal of maximizing conversion and ensuring the highest competitiveness index for the assigned hotels.
  • Analyze demand data and booking patterns using internal tools to align contracted products with the demand from our agency network.
  • Advise on online marketing and direct sales.
  • Identify business opportunities in terms of new products, offers, or other services, in coordination with the department head and the Business Acceleration area.



You will shine in this position if you have:



  • A minimum of 2–3 years of experience.
  • Education in tourism or a related field.
  • Customer orientation.
  • Negotiation skills.
  • Advanced level of English.

title: Software Engineer Generative AI
description:
Corus Consulting is a consulting firm with more than 15 years of experience with different clients worldwide; we have presence in Europe, United States, Asia and Mexico.

We are looking for your talent to work as:


Software Engineer Generative AI


Description:


We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced full-stack Software Engineer Expert Senior Manager with Gen AI /LLM expertise to join our Gen AI platform team. This role focuses on building and maintaining cloud-native platforms specifically designed for Generative AI and Large Language Model (LLM) development. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in reusable software components, frameworks, microservices and APIs, cloud infrastructure, and DevOps/MLOps/LLMOps, with a passion for creating scalable, reliable, and efficient systems.


Location:

Fully Remote in Mexico, Colombia or Brasil


Must-Have Requirements:

  • Advanced English Level skills
  • Proven experience in Generative AI/ LLM based development.
  • Strong knowledge and experience in building conversational agent-based UX.
  • Strong experience working with key LLM models APIs (e.g. AWS Bedrock, Azure Open AI/ OpenAI) and LLM Frameworks (e.g. LangChain, LlamaIndex)
  • Experience with multi-agent frameworks and an understanding of multi-agent systems and their applications in complex, multi-step problem-solving scenarios.
  • Expertise in building enterprise grade, secure data ingestion pipelines for unstructured data – including indexing, search, and advance retrieval patterns.
  • Proficiency in generating and working with text embeddings with understanding of embedding spaces and their applications in semantic search and information retrieval.
  • Knowledge and Experience in building knowledge graphs in production.
  • Experience with RAG concepts and fundamentals (VectorDBs, AWS OpenSearch, semantic search, etc.), Expertise in implementing RAG systems that combine knowledge bases with Generative AI models.
  • Proficiency in Python, TypeScript, NodeJS, ReactJS (and equivalent) and all associated GenAI libraries and frameworks.
  • Experience with containerization and orchestration technologies (Kubernetes, Docker).

title: MuleSoft Developer
description:
Our client is seeking a talented Software Engineer with expertise in MuleSoft to design, develop, and support integration solutions using the MuleSoft Anypoint Platform. This role will contribute to the creation of high-quality APIs, optimize existing integrations, and collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver robust enterprise solutions.


Key Responsibilities

  • Design and develop system and data integrations using the MuleSoft Anypoint Platform.
  • Build high-quality APIs and implement integration solutions following industry best practices.
  • Write unit tests and ensure adequate code coverage to validate business logic and system functionality.
  • Create and maintain technical documentation, including high-level design and implementation details.
  • Tune and enhance existing integration solutions to improve performance and reliability.
  • Troubleshoot and resolve complex technical issues across various systems.
  • Participate in Agile ceremonies and actively contribute to DevOps and CI/CD practices.
  • Collaborate with internal teams and external partners to ensure seamless solution delivery.
  • Participate in and lead peer code reviews to ensure code quality and maintainability.
  • Stay up to date with evolving technologies, tools, and industry trends.


Required Qualifications and Experience

  • Bachelors Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (or equivalent work experience).
  • MuleSoft Certified Developer Level 1 (Mule 4) is required.
  • 2+ years of hands-on experience developing MuleSoft applications.
  • 3+ years of experience in software engineering with a focus on integration and middleware technologies.
  • Familiarity with Java or Python is a plus.
  • Experience with integration and messaging platforms such as JMS, Amazon SQS, or Azure Service Bus.
  • Proficiency in API-Led connectivity, batch processing, and enterprise integration patterns (EIPs).
  • Solid experience in building and consuming SOAP and RESTful web services.
  • Experience working in Agile teams and with CI/CD tools such as GitLab or Azure DevOps.
  • Knowledge of MuleSoft connectors (Salesforce, HTTP, DB, SOAP, FTP, etc.) and connection strategies.
  • Understanding of security protocols such as SSL, Basic Auth, SAML, OAuth2, and experience with API gateways.
  • Knowledge of CloudHub 2.0 and Runtime Fabric (RTF), especially with Azure Kubernetes Service, is a plus.
  • Experience in building scalable solutions with exception handling and logging frameworks.


Preferred Skills

  • Experience with automation platforms like UI Path or Power Automate is a plus.
  • Strong communication and collaboration skills, comfortable working with distributed teams.
  • Self-motivated and goal-oriented, with the ability to adapt quickly in a fast-paced environment.
  • Passion for continuous learning and exploring emerging technologies.

title: Professor de italiano
