title: Customer Service Representative (Portuguese)
description:
About BingX


  • A leading crypto exchange since 2018
  • With 20 million registered users worldwide
  • Official crypto exchange partner of Chelsea FC
  • User-First, reliable, innovative, and diversified
  • List over 1,000 spot trading pairs
  • Offer over 300 futures trading pairs
  • Integrate with over 80 public chain ecosystems
  • Rank top on CoinMarketCap and CoinGecko
  • TradingView's Best Crypto Exchange for 2021, 2022 & 2023
  • A gateway for the next billion crypto users


Founded in 2018, BingX is a leading cryptocurrency exchange, serving over 20 million users worldwide. BingX offers diversified products and services, including spot, derivatives, copy trading, and asset management – all designed for the evolving needs of users, from beginners to professionals.


BingX is committed to providing a trustworthy platform that empowers users with innovative tools and features to elevate their trading proficiency.


Our current vacancy | Full-time | Long-term | REMOTE


Responsibilities


  • Handle customer inquiries via live chat, email, and other channels regarding accounts, trading, payments, etc.
  • Assist customers with KYC verification, account security setup, and dispute resolution.
  • Accurately document and escalate customer issues, collaborating with technical teams for complex cases.
  • Stay updated on futures trading rules and promptly communicate platform announcements/risk alerts (training provided).
  • Adapt to shift schedules (if required) to ensure coverage during target market hours.
  • Willing to work weekends and irregular hours which will include night shifts.


Requirements


  • Have an online customer support experience, and proficiency in tools like Zendesk/LiveChat.
  • Fast learner, able to master derivatives trading terminology quickly.
  • Patient, resilient, and skilled in de-escalating high-tension situations.
  • Familiarity with Brazilian/Portuguese user communication styles; finance or customer service experience preferred.
  • Proficiency in Portuguese and English is essential.

title: Calypso Functional FO-MO
description:
Project Description:

Luxoft has one of the world's leading Calypso practices.

We are a top-tier Calypso Partner and a market leader in implementation, integration, upgrade, and migration.

We provide end-to-end project services and have delivered Calypso projects across all major asset classes and sectors including investment banking, asset management, corporate treasury, and insurance.


Project Description:

Support and additional build out (projects) for Calypso instance.


Responsibilities:

- Address and respond to production support issues and trouble shoot issues arising from day-to-day activities Calypso instance

- Provide support to FO and MO users on Calypso

- Configure, updated, optimize functional set up in Calypso

- Execute (where required) SOD/ EOD Scheduled Tasks

- Develop necessary functional solutions for Calypso instance as per requirements (if required)

- Monitor if market quotes fail to update Calypso system error messages

- Monitor feed & security definitions download, if reprocessing of trades needed or reprocessing of events

- Ensures supporting documents are complete, current, and appropriately stored

- Works closely with relevant business and technology stakeholders to ensure effective and efficient implementation of the project(s)

- Submits status reports to stakeholders; coordinates and provides updates to steering committees

- Collaboration with key functional or business stakeholders to achieve clear outcomes/deliverables in relation to the strategic and transformational book of work

- Manage deliverables ensuring transparency of risks, issues and dependencies that are fully aligned to functional / business owners


You might be acting also as a business analyst as well in order to help the team gathering and writing requirements, acceptance criteria.


A Sampling of Tasks Expected to be Performed:

1. Configuring Standard & Custom Interfaces within Calypso

2. Setting up Quote Feeds from Bloomberg

3. Set-up Holiday Calendar feed

4. Set-up Interest Rate Curves & other market data

5. Set-up Dividend Curves for Custom Index

6. Set-up Equity Volatility Surface feeds

7. Translate Historical Volatility of Volatility-controlled indexes to a Volatility Surface to be used in Calypso

8. Set-up pricing configuration & pricing parameters

9. Some end-of-day processing/monitoring needed


Skills Description:

• 3+ years of experience working in Capital Markets and Calypso

• Good knowledge of Financial products cross assets

- Expertise with a front-to-back Calypso derivatives solution, including accounting, is a must. Preferably with an insurance

industry focus.


Other Required Skills:

- Ability to work with little supervision, be a fast learner, self-motivated, team player, and collaborator with strong problem-solving

skills.

- Must be resourceful and demonstrate initiative in getting the job done.

- Good oral and written communication skills are essential.


- Ability to train and transfer knowledge to Guardian's business and technology stakeholders

• Proven track record of delivery of implementation / migration projects

• Proven experience in the development of Calypso integrations, reporting, and other technical aspects

- Experience of adherence to governance frameworks / implementation and handover to BAU

• Comprehensive knowledge of trade flow, trading systems and related concepts and technology, including valuation and client/market risk management

• Leadership skills

• Excellent analytical skills, understanding of project life cycles, and ability to act in an entrepreneurial manner to ensure the requirements from the business are gathered in the appropriate manner.

• Proven analytical, planning, problem solving and decision-making skills

• Comfortable with direct communication with all levels of technical and business resources

• Excellent organizational and time management skills with the ability to handle multiple tasks simultaneously

• Experience with working in a highly collaborative and dynamic multi-team environment

title: Senior Software Engineer (C#/.NET)
description:
We are looking for a full-time, remote Senior Software Engineer with 7+ years of experience producing commercial-grade software that is highly maintainable and supportable. The ideal candidate will have extensive API and application/system integration experience working in a vibrant, dynamic startup environment, strong problem-solving abilities, as well as the ability to learn new technologies and concepts quickly.


Founded in 2003, our client transforms the traditional restaurant point-of-sale (POS) terminal into an integrated 360-degree operational management system. Their solution increases brand loyalty through improved customer experiences, optimizes operations resulting in lower costs, and increases sales volumes through comprehensive analytics and employee performance insights. Over 7,000 restaurant locations use their technology today, and they process over $5 billion of payments annually.


You'll collaborate with senior and principal engineers across North and South America, owning features from concept through support and watching users adopt them right away. If you thrive on delivering practical solutions quickly and iterating in production, you'll enjoy our pace, otherwise, you might find the pace a bit intense.


Responsibilities

  • Full life-cycle commercial software development and maintenance - analyze specifications, document requirements, architect/design, develop, and maintain software solutions
  • Collaborate with teams to design, develop, and produce high-quality code following best practices and standards for both new features and existing application maintenance
  • Support and refactor legacy code using modern methodologies and technologies
  • Analyze code to identify defect root causes and provide resolutions
  • Design, implement, and maintain automated CI/CD pipelines to streamline software build, testing, and deployment processes across various environments
  • Participate in daily standups and weekly team meetings to review priorities, progress, new ideas, and technologies
  • Address defects identified during various testing cycles
  • Perform high-quality peer reviews


Required Experience

  • 7+ years of professional C# / .NET building production systems and integrations
  • Excellent written & spoken English; can articulate tradeoffs with teammates and stakeholders
  • Modern JavaScript framework experience (Vue.js preferred) plus solid backend C#
  • Fluent with Git and modern branching / PR workflows
  • Rapid learner: You're expected to ramp up on a new library or API in hours, not weeks
  • Ownership mentality: you design, build, ship, monitor, and fix the features you touch
  • Bias for shipping (80/20): working code in prod today beats perfect code next month - must compromise sometimes
  • Comfort working end-to-end: UI, API, data layer, infra scripts, whatever it takes
  • Team first: transparent, reliable, decisive, and laser-focused on customer impact


Desired Experience

  • University degree or equivalent education (Technical or Engineering degree is optimal)
  • Knowledge of JavaScript, React.js, Vue.js, or Razor
  • Experience with GitHub Actions, Octopus, or Datadog
  • Familiarity with Postman


Additional Information

  • Knowing your ideas are heard and matter, think big!
  • You get to own your job and be recognized for your contributions
  • Work with smart and creative people
  • Making mistakes is human. Let's learn from them. Be transparent!
  • We recognize you as an individual with no presumptions or judgment. Be the extraordinary you!
  • 15 days Paid Time Off (PTO), 1 floating day, 3 sick days, and designated national holidays
  • Start: ASAP


About Velozient

We are a privately held, nearshore software development company providing outsourced development resources to North American companies. Our mission is to offer development talent who enjoy taking on challenging work, want to grow their skills and experiences building software, and excel in a fast-paced, dynamic team environment. We are focused on providing world-class remote resources to work as valued client team members. If this type of opportunity excites you, then consider joining our team!

  • Full life-cycle commercial software development and maintenance - analyze specifications, document requirements, architect/design, develop, and maintain software solutions
  • Collaborate with teams to design, develop, and produce high-quality code following best practices and standards for both new features and existing application maintenance
  • Support and refactor legacy code using modern methodologies and technologies
  • Analyze code to identify defect root causes and provide resolutions
  • Design, implement, and maintain automated CI/CD pipelines to streamline software build, testing, and deployment processes across various environments
  • Participate in daily standups and weekly team meetings to review priorities, progress, new ideas, and technologies
  • Address defects identified during various testing cycles
  • Perform high-quality peer reviews


Required Experience

  • 7+ years of professional C# / .NET building production systems and integrations
  • Excellent written & spoken English; can articulate tradeoffs with teammates and stakeholders
  • Modern JavaScript framework experience (Vue.js preferred) plus solid backend C#
  • Fluent with Git and modern branching / PR workflows
  • Rapid learner: You're expected to ramp up on a new library or API in hours, not weeks
  • Ownership mentality: you design, build, ship, monitor, and fix the features you touch
  • Bias for shipping (80/20): working code in prod today beats perfect code next month - must compromise sometimes
  • Comfort working end-to-end: UI, API, data layer, infra scripts, whatever it takes
  • Team first: transparent, reliable, decisive, and laser-focused on customer impact


Desired Experience

  • University degree or equivalent education (Technical or Engineering degree is optimal)
  • Knowledge of JavaScript, React.js, Vue.js, or Razor
  • Experience with GitHub Actions, Octopus, or Datadog
  • Familiarity with Postman


Additional Information

  • Knowing your ideas are heard and matter, think big!
  • You get to own your job and be recognized for your contributions
  • Work with smart and creative people
  • Making mistakes is human. Let's learn from them. Be transparent!
  • We recognize you as an individual with no presumptions or judgment. Be the extraordinary you!
  • 15 days Paid Time Off (PTO), 1 floating day, 3 sick days, and designated national holidays
  • Start: ASAP


About Velozient

We are a privately held, nearshore software development company providing outsourced development resources to North American companies. Our mission is to offer development talent who enjoy taking on challenging work, want to grow their skills and experiences building software, and excel in a fast-paced, dynamic team environment. We are focused on providing world-class remote resources to work as valued client team members. If this type of opportunity excites you, then consider joining our team!

title: Meta & LinkedIn Ad Specialist
description:
Hey, Dingus!

Yeah, you heard that right. Dingus & Zazzy is looking for a Meta & LinkedIn Ad Specialist to join our growing team!


About Us

Dingus & Zazzy is a comprehensive digital marketing agency offering services for brands looking to expand their presence across a variety of digital platforms. Our business is expanding globally, and we need talented folks on our team to continue offering stellar service to our clients.

Running a company is a little like building a plane while flying it. There’s always too much to do; doing one thing means neglecting something else. You have to blog, but also be active on social media. You have to build websites and then optimize them for mobile. Email lists. Emails. Keywords. SEM. SEO. UX. UI. FML. OMG. That’s where we come in. We provide an unlimited get-shit-done subscription for our clients. And we need your help!


About the Role

Want to make a real impact with Meta and LinkedIn ads alongside a cool team that actually gets things done? We’re seeking a motivated person to jump into the exciting world of paid social and professional advertising. You’ll play a key role in building and refining campaigns to help our clients reach their target audience and get tangible results. If you’re looking for a supportive place to learn and grow, we’d love to hear from you!


What You’ll Do

  • Create and manage ad campaigns on Meta and LinkedIn based on each client’s goals and audience
  • Research audiences on both platforms to figure out who we should be targeting (demographics, interests, job titles, etc.)
  • Set and adjust ad budgets to get the best results for the money spent
  • Use different targeting options like custom and lookalike audiences, interests, job roles, and industries
  • Watch how ads are performing and make changes to improve results (e.g., engagement, conversions, cost per lead)
  • Run A/B tests on different ads, targeting, and landing pages to see what works best
  • Set up tools like Meta Pixel and LinkedIn Insight Tag to track results and understand what’s driving conversions
  • Share easy-to-understand reports with your team and clients that explain what’s working, what’s not, and what to do next
  • Keep up with updates and changes on both platforms, and apply what you learn to improve campaign performance
  • Work closely with the media team, account managers, and creatives to keep everything aligned
  • Help document processes and share what’s working across the team
  • Keep campaign info and data organized and easy to access


What We’re Looking For

  • Experience running and improving ad campaigns on both Meta and LinkedIn
  • Comfortable using Meta Ads Manager and LinkedIn Campaign Manager
  • Knows how to target the right people on each platform (by job title, industry, interests, etc.)
  • Can track performance and make smart decisions based on the data
  • Has used tracking tools like Meta Pixel and LinkedIn Insight Tag
  • Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail
  • Good at managing time, staying organized, and communicating clearly
  • Can work solo and with a team
  • English fluency (written and spoken)
  • Certifications from Meta or LinkedIn are a plus
  • A degree is nice, but solid experience matters more


Bonus Points

  • You’ve used ad automation or bid management tools
  • You’ve worked with other platforms like Google Ads
  • You’ve worked at an agency before


Our operating hours are from 9 am to 5 pm MST, Monday to Friday.

Ready for the ride of your life? If you think you’re the perfect fit for the role, apply today!

title: Desenvolvedor Backend Java Pleno
description:
Como será o seu dia a dia


  • Trabalhar em time ágil participando das cerimônias, manter o ambiente saudável entre os membros da equipe e promover entregas constantes com qualidade e segurança;
  • Desenvolver o produto com qualidade por meio da criação de testes e revisão de código, prover melhorias e corrigir eventuais problemas nos produtos por meio de priorização do Product Owner a fim de garantir a satisfação do cliente com a empresa;
  • Subir o produto em ambiente de produção por meio de integração contínua garantindo sua estabilização.


Será necessário


  • Desenvolvimento Orientado a objetos;
  • Desenvolvimento de testes unitários;
  • Programação na linguagem Java, preferencialmente a partir da versão 8; Spring Framework;
  • Criação de APIs HTTP seguindo o padrão REST;
  • Versionamento usando Git;
  • Conhecimento em Arquiteturas baseadas em micro serviços;
  • Modelagem e uso de Banco de Dados NoSQL, como MongoDB; Cassandra; Uso de cache, com Redis.
  • Será um diferencial experiência com, Mensagerias (Kafka, RabbitMQ); Metodologias ágeis; Desenvolvimento baseado em TDD, BDD; Criação de testes de integração e testes de carga; Uso de containers com Docker; Kubernetes;


Benefícios que oferecemos:

  • VR/VA, Vale Transporte, Assistência Médica e Odontológica e Auxílio Creche.
  • Gympass para bem-estar e saúde.
  • Bolsa de estudo com até 50% de desconto.
  • Descontos especiais nas empresas do Grupo Magalu (Magalu, Netshoes, Época Cosméticos, Estante Virtual, Kabum entre outras).
  • Auxílio Creche


Modelo de Trabalho

Adotamos o modelo 100% remoto, proporcionando flexibilidade, enquanto mantém a interação virtual com a equipe para garantir uma colaboração eficaz e um ambiente de crescimento contínuo.


‘’Se você busca um ambiente de crescimento e desafios, Vem ser feliz’’!

Nossos valores nos unem e nossas diferenças nos potencializam como um grupo. Mais do que igualdade, buscamos equidade: Aqui, temos espaço para sermos autênticos, independentemente de gênero, etnia, raça, orientação sexual, clero ou deficiência.

title: Security Engineer Sênior
description:
Quem é Stone Tech?

A Stone nasceu com o propósito de ser protagonista na transformação da indústria de pagamentos, lutando para oferecer as melhores soluções para quem empreende no Brasil.

Pensando nisso, construímos a Stone Tech! A junção dos times de tecnologia Stone Co. e as empresas financeiras do grupo que reconhecem o potencial empreendedor de cada brasileiro. Por aqui, temos todas as inovações e tecnologias de ponta da Stone, Pagar.me, Ton e Vitta, com uma galera referência no mercado de tecnologia, em um ambiente descontraído, repleto de desafios, oportunidades, flexibilidade, teamplay e desenvolvimento contínuo.


Nossa cultura:

Por aqui, vivemos nossa cultura no dia a dia, guiados por esses 5 pilares:

⚡Own It: Ter espírito de dono te faz conquistar a liberdade. Valorizamos a autonomia e a proatividade, somos responsáveis pelo o que entregamos e queremos sempre evoluir o nosso negócio.

Live the Ride: Faça. Feito é melhor que perfeito. Aprendemos com os erros e encaramos desafios como oportunidades de aprendizado.

No Bullshit: Agir com simplicidade. Somos pessoas práticas, sinceras e gostamos de feedbacks. Sabemos que às vezes vamos errar e contamos com essa transparência para evoluirmos.

⚡Own It: Ter espírito de dono te faz conquistar a liberdade. Valorizamos a autonomia e a proatividade, somos responsáveis pelo o que entregamos e queremos sempre evoluir o nosso negócio.

Live the Ride: Faça. Feito é melhor que perfeito. Aprendemos com os erros e encaramos desafios como oportunidades de aprendizado.

No Bullshit: Agir com simplicidade. Somos pessoas práticas, sinceras e gostamos de feedbacks. Sabemos que às vezes vamos errar e contamos com essa transparência para evoluirmos.

title: Security Engineer Sênior
description:
Quem é Stone Tech?

A Stone nasceu com o propósito de ser protagonista na transformação da indústria de pagamentos, lutando para oferecer as melhores soluções para quem empreende no Brasil.

Pensando nisso, construímos a Stone Tech! A junção dos times de tecnologia Stone Co. e as empresas financeiras do grupo que reconhecem o potencial empreendedor de cada brasileiro. Por aqui, temos todas as inovações e tecnologias de ponta da Stone, Pagar.me, Ton e Vitta, com uma galera referência no mercado de tecnologia, em um ambiente descontraído, repleto de desafios, oportunidades, flexibilidade, teamplay e desenvolvimento contínuo.


Nossa cultura:

Por aqui, vivemos nossa cultura no dia a dia, guiados por esses 5 pilares:

title: Representante Comercial
description:
Estamos expandindo nosso time de representantes comerciais em todo o Brasil e buscamos profissionais para atuação em diversos cidades.

As vagas estão disponíveis para atuação nos segmentos de Bazar, Utilidades domésticas e Material de construção.

As responsabilidades diárias incluem buscar novos clientes, manter o relacionamento com clientes existentes e identificar oportunidades de vendas. Além disso, participar de feiras e eventos do setor, realizar negociações comerciais e apresentar nosso portfólio de produtos.


Locais de atuação: 


Fortaleza - CE

João Pessoa - PB

Natal – RN

Recife – PE

Maceió – Al

Sergipe

Cuiabá – MT

Sinop – MT

Rondonópolis – MT

Belo Horizonte – MG

Vale do Aço – MG

Montes Claros – MG

Juiz de Fora – MG

Rio de Janeiro – RJ

São Paulo / Zona Norte – SP

São Paulo / Zona Sul - SP

São Paulo / Zona Leste - SP

São Paulo / Zona Oeste – SP

São José do Rio Preto – SP

Campinas – SP

Vale do Parnaíba – SP

Sorocaba – SP

ABC – SP

Ribeirão Preto – SP

Curitiba – PR

Londrina – PR

Cascavel – PR

Florianópolis – SC


Requisitos


• É fundamental possuir empresa de representação comercial - Registro no CORE;

• Atuação nos segmentos de bazar e utilidades domésticas ou material de contrução;


Diferencial


• Histórico de expansão, prospecção e abertura de mercado será um diferencial;


Qualificações


• Vendas e Negociação: Necessário ter experiência em técnicas de vendas, prospecção de novos clientes e habilidades de negociação.

• Comunicação: Habilidade de comunicação eficaz, tanto verbalmente quanto por escrito, para garantir interação produtiva com os clientes e equipe interna.

• Conhecimento do Setor: Familiaridade com o setor de móveis e acessórios para lojas é um diferencial importante.

• Além das habilidades acima, serão considerados diferenciais a fluência em outros idiomas e a formação em Administração, Marketing ou áreas afins.


A DiCarlo, fundada em 1995, é uma das empresas mais respeitadas no segmento de utilidades domésticas e decoração para lojas no Brasil. Com um catálogo diversificado de mais de 700 skus, incluindo linhas completas para organização, banheiro, decoração closet, araras, prateleiras, mobiliários modulares entre outros. 

Oferecemos soluções inovadoras para organização de ambientes e otimização de espaços. Possuímos um parque fabril moderno em Indaial, SC, e empregamos mais de mil pessoas direta e indiretamente. 

Nosso compromisso com a qualidade e o respeito ao cliente mantém-se inabalável ao longo desses 30 anos.


Candidate - se através do linkedin ou envie seu currículo para o email  

Vem ser DiCarlo.

title: Protesista
description:
Cirurgiã dentista com especialização em prótese

Localização:  Clínica de Referência em Reabilitação Oral - Feira de Santana, BA

Descrição da Empresa:

Nossa clínica se dedica a proporcionar cuidados odontológicos de alta qualidade, com foco na saúde e bem-estar dos pacientes, utilizando tecnologia avançada e uma abordagem humanizada. Nossa missão é transformar sorrisos e vidas, sendo reconhecidos como referência em reabilitação oral na região.

Responsabilidades:

  • Realizar avaliações e tratamento de pacientes com necessidade de próteses dentárias.
  • Trabalhar em colaboração com nossa equipe multidisciplinar para desenvolver planos de tratamento personalizados.
  • Utilizar tecnologias avançadas de odontologia digital para a fabricação de próteses.
  • Garantir a satisfação do paciente através de um atendimento humanizado e de qualidade.

Requisitos:

  • Cirurgiã(o) dentista com especialização em Prótese Dentária.
  • Registro ativo no CRO.
  • Experiência prévia na área será um diferencial.
  • Excelentes habilidades de comunicação e capacidade de trabalho em equipe.
  • Proatividade e comprometimento com a excelência no atendimento ao paciente.

Oferecemos:

  • Ambiente de trabalho colaborativo e inovador.
  • Oportunidades de desenvolvimento e crescimento profissional.
  • Estrutura moderna e equipada com tecnologia de ponta.
  • Remuneração compatível com a função e benefícios adicionais.

Se você deseja fazer parte de uma equipe que transforma sorrisos e vidas, envie seu currículo para com o assunto "Vaga Protesista – Seu Nome".


Esperamos por você!

title: Consultor de Negócios
description:
Engesoftware está em busca de um Consultor de Negócios SR para compor o seu time!

Vaga extensível para Pessoas com Deficiência - PCD


Benefícios:

  • Apoio jurídico, caso precise;
  • Apoio nutricional, para uma alimentação mais saudável;
  • Apoio financeiro, para planejar finanças pessoais ou investimento a longo prazo;
  • Apoio social, orientação para momentos pessoais difíceis;
  • Apoio psicológico, para aquecer a mente e o coração;
  • Descontos exclusivos com instituições como Descontos exclusivos com instituições como (SESI, SESC, Anhanguera, Estácio, IESB, Unifametro e Rockfeller);
  • Crédito consignado (Vipe);
  • Plano Enge Pets, seu amiguinho peludo terá o melhor cuidado;
  • Parceria com o Bali Park, O Bal é um espaço de lazer e entretenimento;
  • VA/VR;
  • Plano de saúde;
  • Plano odontológico (Bradesco);
  • Seguro de vida (Santander zuric);
  • Salário a combinar;
  • Vaga na modalidade Home Office;


Requisitos Necessários:

  • Ensino superior concluído em TI ou áreas correlatas;
  • Especialização em Direto Tributário;
  • Possuir ao menos uma das seguintes certificações: Scrum Alliance: CSM (Certified Scrum Master), CSPO (Certified Scrum Product Owner) ou CSD (Certified Scrum Developer);
  • PSM I (Professional Scrum Master I), PSPO (Professional Scrum Product Owner) ou PSD (Professional Scrum Developer); SSM (SAFe Scrum Master) ou POPM (SAFe Product Owner/Product Manager);
  • Possuir ao menos uma das seguintes certificações: CBAP (Certified Business Analysis Professional); BPM : CBPP (Certified Business Process Professional), OCEB Business Advanced ou OCEB Technical Advanced; CPRE (Certified Professional for Requirements Engineering).
  • Experiência em projetos de Desenvolvimento de Software;


Requisitos Desejáveis:

  • Experiência mínima de 3 anos na área;


Estamos em busca de um profissional que queira somar com o nosso time e crescer com a gente!!

Venha ser um Power Enge!!!

title: Technical Recruiting Manager | up to USD $4000.00 per month | Level C1 or C2 English required
description:
-Please note: We are only looking for professionals with a Cambridge or CEFR proficiency of C1 or C2. If you don't have this proficiency, please DO NOT apply.


-You MUST BE ABLE TO WORK from 9am to 6pm Los Angeles time (GMT-8) Monday to Friday. This is non-negotiable.


  • This is a 100% remote position.


  • Compensation can vary widely depending on each candidate's particular qualifications. If you don't have significant experience and demonstrated success, please don't ask for the top end of the salary range.


  • Guaranteed monthly salary for this role ranges from USD $1600.00 to USD $3200.00 per month depending on the qualifications of the individual.


  • The total monthly compensation , including performance bonuses and salary, can be up to USD $4000.00 per month or even higher.




----------

We are looking for professional individuals with Technical Aptitude , competitive spirit, drive, team mentality, courage, commitment, perseverance, and a desire to build a long-term career in a fast-paced environment.


As a Technical Recruiting Manager, you'll get to work with both candidates and clients to bring together the right people with the right opportunities. The ability to focus on niche skill sets will be critical in helping you develop methodologies for sourcing hard-to-find technical and professional specialists.


A key part of the position is the ability to give the best part of yourself every day to deliver the highest quality recruiting services to internal business partners and use a variety of customized recruiting strategies to meet clients' needs.


Benefits of Joining Our Team:

• Growth potential within the organization including a defined career path for recruiter and sales professionals. We are looking for this person to become a leader of our Latin America team.

• Unlimited earning potential, including a competitive base salary and generous bonus structure

• Vacation, holiday, and Sick pay.


Recruiter Responsibilities:

• Support a team of Account Executives in their efforts to identify and place various technical and non-technical candidates.

• Recruit top talent and match their career goals with our clients' hiring needs.

• Develop recruiting strategies to identify qualified candidates by using specialized networking tools.

• Source candidates by networking within the industry, and making cold calls as necessary.

• Evaluate the strengths and weaknesses of candidates through our screening process.

• Negotiate unique compensation packages (wages, benefits, etc.) to attract and close candidates.

• Meet performance goals based on common metrics including submits, time to submit, and hires.

• Bachelor's degree or equivalent work experience or military experience.

• Highly developed verbal and written communication skills.

• Resilience and perseverance.

• Goal-driven – ability to achieve weekly and annual expected business results.

• Strong customer service skills, working closely with Technical Professionals.

• Ability to multi-task.

• Entrepreneurial spirit with the passion to exceed customer's expectations.

title: Pessoa Desenvolvedora ADVPL Sr
description:
DESCRIÇÃO DA VAGA:

Prestar o suporte técnico aos nossos clientes provendo soluções de desenvolvimento

com empatia, proatividade e garantindo a satisfação dos clientes com os produtos e

serviços TOTVS.


O QUE VOCÊ VAI FAZER:

Atuar com desenvolvimento e manutenção de software, codificação de back-end e front-end;

Desenvolver soluções técnicas complexas, através do desenvolvimento de requisitos de softwares utilizando-se das tecnologias envolvidas no projeto;

Compreender a arquitetura do software e ser capaz de atuar nela através da análise de seus componentes, organização e funcionalidades;

Documentar as etapas de desenvolvimento realizando o registro do desenvolvimento nas ferramentas de versionamento e documentação;

Trabalhar com o time de desenvolvimento para encontrar soluções de negócio, arquitetura e desenho através da comunicação e trocas de conhecimento;

Manter a qualidade do software verificando os processos, ferramentas e boas práticas disponíveis para o produto e tecnologia utilizados.

O QUE ESPERAMOS DE VOCÊ:

Conhecimento em programação ADVPL;

Conhecimento em programação SQL;

Vivencia em ambientes que utilizem metodologia Ágil.

Conhecimento em banco de dados.

Conhecimento em PO UI; (desejável)

Conhecimento em processo de negócios PROTHEUS - backoffice/RH. (desejável)


#Junte-se a nós e faça parte da transformação rumo à excelência na plataforma TOTVS Apps!#


INFORMAÇÕES ADICIONAIS

Antes de mostrar nossos benefícios, deixa eu já te contar uma coisa: aqui as coisas acontecem em um ritmo acima da média.

A rotina em uma empresa de tecnologia é alucinante e o aprendizado é contínuo e diário. O melhor disso é que temos autonomia para colocar esse aprendizado em prática e buscar resultados.

E se errarmos? Voltamos e consertamos rápido, até criarmos aquilo que acreditamos ser parte da transformação de cada cliente.

Isso tudo acelera o nosso crescimento e nos torna a maior empresa de tecnologia do Brasil, ditando o ritmo do mercado nos mais diversos setores, fazendo tecnologia que transforma.

Dito isso, oferecemos:

● Universidade em Rede TOTVS, uma universidade Corporativa com conteúdos e certificações gratuitos para cada TOTVER;

● Programa +Saudáveis, que cuida de cada TOTVER com assessoria e ações voltadas para o bem estar em corpo, mente e finanças pessoais;

● Programa +Vantagens, a maior rede de descontos da América Latina, exclusivos para TOTVERS;

● Programa + Cuidado, programa de apoio pessoal para TOTVERS e familiares, com orientações em diversas especialidades como: psicologia, serviço social, pet consultoria...

● Einstein Conecta, benefício de orientação médica online pelos médicos do Hospital Israelita Albert Einstein, totalmente gratuito;

● Plano de saúde e odontológico;

● Vale refeição e / ou alimentação;

● Vale transporte;

● Licença maternidade e paternidade estendida;

● Espaço de lactário;

● Bicicletário;

● Vestiário;

● Seguro de vida;

● Auxílio creche;

● Previdência privada;

● Escritório que estimula a criatividade e produtividade com ambientes para lanches, salas de jogos, mesas de bilhar e poltronas para relaxar;

● Gympass.

Nós valorizamos a diversidade e inclusão, consideramos todos os candidatos para as nossas vagas, independente de cor, raça, religião, gênero e identidade de gênero, nacionalidade, deficiência, orientação sexual, ascendência, idade, etc.

#Ouseetransforme #sejaTOTVER

Nós valorizamos a diversidade e inclusão, consideramos todos os candidatos para as nossas vagas, independente de cor, raça, religião, gênero e identidade de gênero, nacionalidade, deficiência, orientação sexual, ascendência, idade, etc.

#Ouseetransforme #sejaTOTVER

title: Security Operations Center Analyst - SOC Jr.
description:
A cutting-edge information technology company based in the USA with a strong presence around the globe is looking for you!



Join our team as: SOC Analyst JR.



Requirements:


  • 1 up to 3/4 years’ experience in information technology or cybersecurity
  • Strong understanding in any of the cyber security tools like ( SIEM QRadar, Falcon CrowdStrike, ServiceNow, Azure Defender 365, Proofpoint, PaloAlto) - MUST HAVE
  • Strong participation and willingness to collaborate in team settings
  • Strong initiative, participation, and willingness to collaborate in team settings.
  • Strong communication skills, both written and oral.
  • Basic understanding of monitoring, analyzing, and triaging security events using a SIEM.
  • Ability to work independently, prioritize tasks, and escalate issues when necessary.
  • Basic knowledge of malware analysis during incident response investigations.
  • COVERSATIONAL English (assessment will be done).



Working days and hours:


  • Saturday to Wednesday from 12:00 p.m. to 8:00 p.m. EST ( Unique schedules).



Key Objective:


  • Monitor security systems and tools such as SIEM, EDR, CSPM, and ITSM, and analyze, and respond to security alerts.
  • Execute playbooks and implement mitigations using SOC tools and technologies.
  • Collaborate closely with customers and team members to provide security recommendations, and remediation action items during security events.
  • Handle tasks and responsibilities assigned through the ticketing system.
  • Respond to ad-hoc client requests through the MDR customer service platform.




We offer:


  • Home Office
  • Full Time Job
  • CTL scheme + Benefits - 8,000 up to 11,500 BRL.



Don't hesitate and share your updated resume in English with us so we can review it and have the pleasure to discuss it in more detail.

title: Senior Fullstack Developer - Golang (Remote)
description:
Olá!

A Aggrandize nasceu em 2015 com a missão de engrandecer pessoas e negócios . Guiados por valores como adaptabilidade, colaboração, foco no cliente e visão de dono, oferecemos soluções que transformam desafios em oportunidades.


Somos especialistas em Platform Engineering , Data Analytics , Modern Applications e Cybersecurity , sempre com o compromisso de impulsionar o crescimento e a inovação de nossos parceiros.

Nosso trabalho é mais do que tecnologia; é sobre potencializar resultados. Increase the power of your business .


Agora que você conhece a cultura Aggrandize, saiba mais sobre a oportunidade:


❇️ O que esperamos de você - Hard Skills:

  • Proficiência em linguagem GoLang.
  • Proficiência em Git e seus principais fluxos de trabalho, incluindo branches, pull requests e merges.
  • Experiência com desenvolvimento de API's.
  • Conhecimentos em testes automatizados e CI/CD.
  • Desenvolvimento e consumo de APIs RESTful, além de conhecimento em protocolo HTTP, autenticação e autorização.
  • Compreensão de princípios de design, padrões de projeto, e arquitetura de sistemas distribuídos.


❇️ O que esperamos de você - Soft Skills:

  • Adaptabilidade;
  • Colaboração;
  • Visão de Dono;
  • Foco no Cliente.


✨O que oferecemos (modalidade CLT):

  • VR/VA de R$38/dia (cartão flexível);
  • Auxílio flex de R$210/mês (cartão flexível);
  • TotalPass;
  • Plano de saúde e odontológico;
  • Seguro de vida;
  • PLR;
  • Day off de aniversário;
  • Treinamentos e certificações custeadas pela Aggrandize;
  • Programa de indicação premiada;
  • Trilha de carreira.

title: KYC Specialist（remote）
description:
Responsibilities:


Conduct international verification case reviews, including individual and corporate verifications.

Review and confirm the results of Anti-Money Laundering (AML) and economic sanctions blacklist screenings.

Coordinate with other departments on KYC/CDD-related workflows and process daily applications.

Assist in optimizing the global customer KYC/CDD process.

Analyze KYC vendor review situations and seek better solutions.

Assist in monitoring the daily status of KYC/CDD and check the system's operation.

Conduct research on the KYC/CDD regulatory requirements and documentation for different countries and complete the research report.

Assist in the implementation of AML policies and other policies involving KYC/CDD.

Responsible for dealing with difficult KYC problems related to Portuguese, Spanish if applicable.

Support the Team Leader in completing other related tasks.


Position Requirements:


A bachelor's degree or higher in finance, law, economics, auditing, languages or related fields from a full-time university program (preference for graduates from internationally renowned universities). Proficiency in Mandarin is preferred.

At least two years of experience in KYC/CDD or other compliance-related roles within banks, securities, or other financial institutions is preferred.

Proficiency in English, with the ability to use English as a working language.

Portuguese or Spanish is the native language.

Familiarity with Anti-Money Laundering and international economic sanctions theories; CAMS certification is a plus.

A stable personality with a strong sense of compliance and responsibility, strong learning and stress tolerance abilities, good communication skills, meticulous work, high enthusiasm, and a sense of responsibility.

Basic data analysis skills and proficiency in using office software such as Excel, Word, PPT.

title: Engenheiro Fullstack (com foco em Frontend) - Time Internacional
description:
A Getronics é líder global em soluções de tecnologia, com uma equipe de mais de 4.000 colegas em 17 países, fornecendo serviços abrangentes de ponta a ponta em todo o mundo. Temos o compromisso de oferecer um atendimento excepcional ao cliente, para permitir que eles se concentrem em seus principais pontos fortes, enquanto confiam suas necessidades de TI à Getronics. Temos uma oportunidade incrível para você se juntar à nossa equipe, na seguinte vaga:


Engenheiro Fullstack (com foco em Frontend) - Time Internacional


O que oferecemos a você:

- Assistência médica sem desconto para titulares

- Assistência odontológica sem desconto para titulares

- Cartão flex tanto para alimentação quanto refeição

- Auxílio home office para vaga remota

- Vale transporte para posições presenciais ou híbridas

- Auxílio creche

- Seguro de vida

- Desconto em terapia: plataforma de apoio psicossocial

- Parceria com instituições de ensino

- Parceria com escolas de idiomas

- Programa de subsídio para aulas de inglês

- Programa de indicações: prêmio para indicações bem-sucedidas

- Licença maternidade estendida de 180 dias e a licença paternidade de 20 dias

- Treinamento completo fornecido como parte de um processo de indução robusto, incluindo oportunidades de desenvolvimento contínuo com nossa plataforma de aprendizado online NorthStar, LinkedIn Learning e Udemy, que possui mais de 80.000 cursos disponíveis

- GetVibes - nosso programa de escuta ativa que nos permite conectar e ouvir feedback de todos os colegas, e como empresa, trabalhamos juntos para elaborar planos de ação para melhorar e desenvolver continuamente a Getronics!


O que esperar desta posição:

  • Estamos em busca de um Engenheiro Fullstack com foco em Frontend para atuar no desenvolvimento, manutenção e evolução de aplicações web modernas.
  • O profissional será responsável por construir interfaces eficientes, responsivas e acessíveis, utilizando React, NextJS e TypeScript, além de colaborar no backend com Python em serviços integrados à AWS.
  • Você irá trabalhar em conjunto com equipes multidisciplinares/multiculturais para garantir a entrega de soluções escaláveis, testáveis e alinhadas às necessidades do negócio e dos usuários.
  • Espera-se familiaridade com testes de interface (UI Test), integrações contínuas via GitHub Actions, e boas práticas de desenvolvimento ágil.


O que esperamos de você:

  • Inglês Fluente (verbal e escrita).
  • Frontend: React, NextJS, TypeScript, Redux.
  • Backend: Python.
  • DevOps/Infra: AWS, GitHub Actions.
  • Testes: UI Testes automatizados.
  • Outros: Git, metodologias ágeis.


Diferenciais:

  • Experiência com testes automatizados de ponta a ponta (com Cypress ou similares).


- Horário de Trabalho 09h às 18hs

- Modelo Remoto


O que fazer em seguida:

Caso você seja a pessoa que estamos procurando, aguarde nosso contato para te conhecermos melhor e siga as instruções durante o processo seletivo. Se você gostaria de fazer alguma pergunta sobre nossas vagas, sobre a Getronics como empresa ou qualquer outra coisa, por favor, não hesite em entrar em contato. A equipe de RH estará disponível no e-mail

Temos o compromisso de oferecer um atendimento excepcional ao cliente, para permitir que eles se concentrem em seus principais pontos fortes, enquanto confiam suas necessidades de TI à Getronics. Temos uma oportunidade incrível para você se juntar à nossa equipe, na seguinte vaga:


Engenheiro Fullstack (com foco em Frontend) - Time Internacional


O que oferecemos a você:

- Assistência médica sem desconto para titulares

- Assistência odontológica sem desconto para titulares

- Cartão flex tanto para alimentação quanto refeição

- Auxílio home office para vaga remota

- Vale transporte para posições presenciais ou híbridas

- Auxílio creche

- Seguro de vida

- Desconto em terapia: plataforma de apoio psicossocial

- Parceria com instituições de ensino

- Parceria com escolas de idiomas

- Programa de subsídio para aulas de inglês

- Programa de indicações: prêmio para indicações bem-sucedidas

- Licença maternidade estendida de 180 dias e a licença paternidade de 20 dias

- Treinamento completo fornecido como parte de um processo de indução robusto, incluindo oportunidades de desenvolvimento contínuo com nossa plataforma de aprendizado online NorthStar, LinkedIn Learning e Udemy, que possui mais de 80.000 cursos disponíveis

- GetVibes - nosso programa de escuta ativa que nos permite conectar e ouvir feedback de todos os colegas, e como empresa, trabalhamos juntos para elaborar planos de ação para melhorar e desenvolver continuamente a Getronics!


O que esperar desta posição:

  • Estamos em busca de um Engenheiro Fullstack com foco em Frontend para atuar no desenvolvimento, manutenção e evolução de aplicações web modernas.
  • O profissional será responsável por construir interfaces eficientes, responsivas e acessíveis, utilizando React, NextJS e TypeScript, além de colaborar no backend com Python em serviços integrados à AWS.
  • Você irá trabalhar em conjunto com equipes multidisciplinares/multiculturais para garantir a entrega de soluções escaláveis, testáveis e alinhadas às necessidades do negócio e dos usuários.
  • Espera-se familiaridade com testes de interface (UI Test), integrações contínuas via GitHub Actions, e boas práticas de desenvolvimento ágil.


O que esperamos de você:

  • Inglês Fluente (verbal e escrita).
  • Frontend: React, NextJS, TypeScript, Redux.
  • Backend: Python.
  • DevOps/Infra: AWS, GitHub Actions.
  • Testes: UI Testes automatizados.
  • Outros: Git, metodologias ágeis.


Diferenciais:

  • Experiência com testes automatizados de ponta a ponta (com Cypress ou similares).


- Horário de Trabalho 09h às 18hs

- Modelo Remoto


O que fazer em seguida:

Caso você seja a pessoa que estamos procurando, aguarde nosso contato para te conhecermos melhor e siga as instruções durante o processo seletivo. Se você gostaria de fazer alguma pergunta sobre nossas vagas, sobre a Getronics como empresa ou qualquer outra coisa, por favor, não hesite em entrar em contato. A equipe de RH estará disponível no e-mail

title: Analista de Linux Júnior
description:
Estamos buscando um(a) Analista de Linux Júnior com perfil técnico e para atuar na administração de servidores Linux e apoiar na automação e segurança dos nossos ambientes.


Requisitos Imprescindíveis:

  • Conhecimento Imprescindível Linux – instalação, configuração e manutenção de servidores
  • Experiência prévia com Sistemas Operacionais e Windows
  • Familiaridade Desejável com Ansible
  • Conhecimento básico/intermediário em scripts (Bash, Python, etc.)
  • Inglês Intermediário/ Avançado


Principais Atividades:

  • Instalação, configuração e monitoramento de servidores Linux
  • Gerenciamento de usuários, permissões e grupos
  • Apoio em troubleshooting e análise de desempenho
  • Criação de scripts e automações com Bash, Python e Ansible
  • Aplicação de atualizações de segurança e hardening
  • Documentação técnica dos ambientes


Sobre vagas:

Horário: 00:00 às 08:00

Modalidade: Full Home Office


O que oferecemos:

  • Ambiente colaborativo e multicultural.
  • Oportunidade de desenvolvimento profissional em uma das líderes globais em tecnologia.
  • Pacote de benefícios competitivo.

title: Especialista Product Manager I
description:
Quem é Stone Tech?

A Stone nasceu com o propósito de ser protagonista na transformação da indústria de pagamentos, lutando para oferecer as melhores soluções para quem empreende no Brasil.


Pensando nisso, construímos a Stone Tech! A junção dos times de tecnologia Stone Co. e as empresas financeiras do grupo que reconhecem o potencial empreendedor de cada brasileiro. Por aqui, temos todas as inovações e tecnologias de ponta da Stone, Pagar.me, Ton e Vitta, com uma galera referência no mercado de tecnologia, em um ambiente descontraído, repleto de desafios, oportunidades, flexibilidade, teamplay e desenvolvimento contínuo.


Nossa cultura:

Por aqui, vivemos nossa cultura no dia a dia, guiados por esses 5 pilares:


⚡Own It: Ter espírito de dono te faz conquistar a liberdade. Valorizamos a autonomia e a proatividade, somos responsáveis pelo o que entregamos e queremos sempre evoluir o nosso negócio.


Live the Ride: Faça. Feito é melhor que perfeito. Aprendemos com os erros e encaramos desafios como oportunidades de aprendizado.


No Bullshit: Agir com simplicidade. Somos pessoas práticas, sinceras e gostamos de feedbacks. Sabemos que às vezes vamos errar e contamos com essa transparência para evoluirmos.

title: Senior Java Software Engineer
description:
Location: Remote

Duration: 7+ months

Compensation (average salary in Brazilian currency): R$170–195/hour


About the Role:

Our client is seeking a Senior Java Software Enginee r to join their development team on a contract basis. This role is part of a large-scale code conversion initiative and offers the opportunity to work across the full software development lifecycle. The ideal candidate will bring deep technical knowledge, a strong foundation in backend API development, and an agile mindset.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Design, build, and maintain scalable APIs using Java and Spring Boot.
  • Develop RESTful services aligned with business needs and best practices.
  • Utilize Spring dependency injection for efficient code structuring.
  • Integrate core Java solutions in scenarios where APIs are not suitable.
  • Work with and adapt existing legacy codebases as part of the transformation process.
  • Write clean, maintainable code with strong attention to performance and reliability.
  • Develop and maintain unit tests using JUnit and participate in code reviews.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including QA and other developers.
  • Participate in agile ceremonies such as sprint planning, reviews, and retrospectives.


Required Skills & Experience:

  • 5+ years of Java development experience with a strong focus on Spring Boot and API creation.
  • Solid knowledge of RESTful API design and microservices architecture.
  • Strong grasp of core Java fundamentals (multithreading, concurrency, memory management).
  • Familiarity with API documentation tools like Swagger/OpenAPI.
  • Experience using Jenkins pipelines and Git version control.


Preferred Qualifications:

  • Exposure to AWS services and cloud-based application development.
  • Familiarity with both SQL and NoSQL database technologies.
  • Experience with older Java versions, particularly Java 8.
  • Basic understanding or experience with generative AI tools and prompt engineering.


Why Apply?

  • Work with a forward-thinking team on a high-impact transformation project.
  • Flexible remote work arrangement.
  • Competitive hourly compensation for an extended contract engagement.


If you're a skilled Java/Spring Boot developer looking for your next exciting contract opportunity, we invite you to apply and be part of this impactful initiative!

title: Graphic Designer
description:
Job Description
About you
You are someone who wants to influence your own development. You’re looking for a company where you have the opportunity to pursue your interests and be able to grow professionally.
You should have extensive experience in designing vehicle wraps and be proficient in Adobe Creative Suite, particularly Adobe Illustrator. This role requires you to have a keen eye for detail, and a strong understanding of industry best practices.
You bring to Applaudo the following competencies:
  • Bachelor’s Degree in Design or similar relevant field.
  • 5+ years of experience in vehicle graphics design.
  • Strong proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite, especially Adobe Illustrator.
  • Ability to create and modify dimensionally accurate templates.
  • Understanding of production file preparation and industry best practices.
  • Excellent attention to detail and ability to work within budget constraints.
  • Willingness to learn and use proprietary task management systems.
You will be accountable for the following responsibilities:
  • Create visually appealing and dimensionally accurate vehicle wrap designs.
  • Utilize Adobe Illustrator to produce high-quality designs.
  • Develop and adjust templates for various vehicle types, ensuring accuracy.
  • Prepare production files with proper layering structures, grouping, and clipping masks.
  • Design within specific material and budget constraints, optimizing material usage.
  • Apply best practices such as rounding corners, applying bleeds, and bubble cuts to designs.
  • Ensure all designs meet required specifications and standards to avoid errors.
  • Use the company's proprietary task management system to manage and distribute projects.
Qualifications
Technical Skills:
Adobe Creative Suite, Adobe Illustrator, Vehicle Graphic Design
Additional Information
Here at Applaudo Studios values as trust, communication, respect, excellence and team work are our keys to success. We know we are working with the best and thus treat each other with respect and admiration without asking.
Submit your application today, and don't miss this opportunity to join the Best Digital team in the Region!
We truly appreciate all the hard and outstanding work our team makes every day at Applaudo Studios, and that's why the perks that we offer, are deeply thought and designed as a way to thank them for their commitment and excellence.
Some of our perks and benefits:
  • Work from home
  • Flexible schedule
  • Celebrations
  • Special discounts
  • Entertainment area
  • Flexible work spaces
  • Great work environment
  • Private medical insurance
  • Benefits may vary according to your location and/or availability. Request further information when applying.

title: Graphic Designer
description:
Job Description
About you
You are someone who wants to influence your own development. You’re looking for a company where you have the opportunity to pursue your interests and be able to grow professionally.
You should have extensive experience in designing vehicle wraps and be proficient in Adobe Creative Suite, particularly Adobe Illustrator. This role requires you to have a keen eye for detail, and a strong understanding of industry best practices.
You bring to Applaudo the following competencies:
  • Bachelor’s Degree in Design or similar relevant field.
  • 5+ years of experience in vehicle graphics design.
  • Strong proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite, especially Adobe Illustrator.
  • Ability to create and modify dimensionally accurate templates.
  • Understanding of production file preparation and industry best practices.
  • Excellent attention to detail and ability to work within budget constraints.
  • Willingness to learn and use proprietary task management systems.
You will be accountable for the following responsibilities:
  • Create visually appealing and dimensionally accurate vehicle wrap designs.
  • Utilize Adobe Illustrator to produce high-quality designs.
  • Develop and adjust templates for various vehicle types, ensuring accuracy.
  • Prepare production files with proper layering structures, grouping, and clipping masks.
  • Design within specific material and budget constraints, optimizing material usage.
  • Apply best practices such as rounding corners, applying bleeds, and bubble cuts to designs.
  • Ensure all designs meet required specifications and standards to avoid errors.
  • Use the company's proprietary task management system to manage and distribute projects.
Qualifications
Technical Skills:
Adobe Creative Suite, Adobe Illustrator, Vehicle Graphic Design
Additional Information
Here at Applaudo Studios values as trust, communication, respect, excellence and team work are our keys to success. We know we are working with the best and thus treat each other with respect and admiration without asking.
Submit your application today, and don't miss this opportunity to join the Best Digital team in the Region!
We truly appreciate all the hard and outstanding work our team makes every day at Applaudo Studios, and that's why the perks that we offer, are deeply thought and designed as a way to thank them for their commitment and excellence.
Some of our perks and benefits:
  • Work from home
  • Flexible schedule
  • Celebrations
  • Special discounts
  • Entertainment area
  • Flexible work spaces
  • Great work environment
  • Private medical insurance
  • Benefits may vary according to your location and/or availability. Request further information when applying.

title: Ilustrador de Jogos Sênior
description:
A RapidPlay Games está procurando um Mestre Ilustrador para Jogos de Cassino!


Mergulhe no mundo vibrante dos jogos de cassino com a RapidPlay Games! Estamos à procura de um Ilustrador de Jogos Sênior, uma verdadeira estrela na arte de transformar conceitos em visuais cativantes, para se juntar à nossa tripulação criativa.


Nesta posição você terá um papel central no ciclo de vida de nossos projetos de jogo, desde a centelha inicial da ideia até o brilho do lançamento, assegurando que cada elemento artístico esteja alinhado com a visão estabelecida.


Seu papel incluirá:

  • Criar o Conceito e Concretizar Visões Artísticas: Da primeira rabiscada no papel até a arte final, você será responsável por sugerir e dar vida a personagens envolventes, cenários imersivos e interfaces intuitivas. Sua criatividade será o combustível que impulsiona o visual dos nossos jogos.
  • Colaboração e Comunicação: Você estará no coração da ação, trabalhando lado a lado com Game Designers, Animadores, Programadores e Game Producers, para garantir que todos os aspectos do jogo fluam em harmonia.


O que buscamos em você:

  • Experiência Comprovada: Você deve trazer ao menos 3 anos de experiência em ilustração 2D, com um portfólio que fala por si. Se tiver experiência em 3D, melhor ainda.
  • Maestria Artística: Seu conhecimento em desenho, composição, perspectiva, iluminação, e teoria das cores deve ser excepcional. Você deve ser capaz de pintar digitalmente com a mesma facilidade que respira. A, experiência com Concepts 2D para Animação é um grande extra.
  • Versatilidade e Criatividade: Habilidade para adaptar-se, criar e propor soluções inovadoras, com estilos diferenciados, mantendo o respeito pelos prazos e diretrizes artísticas.
  • Colaboração e Resiliência: Você deve ser capaz de trabalhar de forma independente e em equipe, aceitando feedbacks e críticas de forma construtiva, e estar acostumado(a) a manter arquivos e pastas sempre atualizados e organizados.
  • Conhecimento e interesse em se aprofundar no uso de AI, acelerando partes do processo e trazendo novas ideias a roda de discussão.
  • Busca constante por conhecimento, seja na área de jogos de cassino, seja em novas ferramentas ou técnicas.


Você se destacará se possuir:

  • Experiência em jogos, particularmente em jogos de cassino.
  • Expertise em design gráfico e UI/UX.
  • Proficiência em inglês.


Detalhes da Posição:

  • Modelo PJ
  • 40 horas semanais
  • Full remote


Junte-se a nós na RapidPlay Games e deixe sua marca no mundo dos jogos de cassino, onde sua arte não apenas será vista, mas vivida e jogada por milhares!

title: Data Engineer
description:
JOB DESCRIPTION

A global biopharmaceutical company is seeking strong Power BI Engineers (junior, mid-level, and lead level) to join their team to support a portfolio of ongoing clinical operations projects. These individuals will work on a team of Power BI Engineers of all levels and will partner with technical and functional partners to meet the project needs. The ideal candidates should and in-depth expertise with Power BI (including DAX and Semantic Model Development), strong PySpark & Python coding experience, and experience with Databricks, Fabric, or a similar Spark platform. Additionally, strong communication skills are a must along with the proven ability to work with cross functional teams and stakeholders to drive project work (to be considered for a Lead level role, candidates must also have working experience leading other team members and their work). These are immediate, ongoing needs that will go until the end of 2025 with the possibility of extensions into 2026. These positions are based in LATAM and candidates are able to sit remotely in either Brazil or Chile.

REQUIRED SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE

- 5+ years of experience with Power BI development and engineering (DAX and semantic model development and deployment) - Strong hands on coding ability in PySpark and Python - Professional working experience with Databricks, Fabirc, or similar Spark platforms - Fair knowledge on the use of Azure Dev Ops (ADO) to manage repository and versions - Strong communication skills and experience engaging directly with business stakeholders and technical teams

NICE TO HAVE SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE

- Knowledge of Tabular and ALM tools to work on Semantic Model and automation - Experience working for a global company/ with a global team



Compensation :

$22/hr to $27/hr.

Exact compensation may vary based on several factors, including skills, experience, and education.

Benefit packages for this role will start on the 31st day of employment and include medical, dental, and vision insurance, as well as HSA, FSA, and DCFSA account options, and 401k retirement account access with employer matching. Employees in this role are also entitled to paid sick leave and/or other paid time off as provided by applicable law.

title: Data Engineer
description:
JOB DESCRIPTION

A global biopharmaceutical company is seeking strong Power BI Engineers (junior, mid-level, and lead level) to join their team to support a portfolio of ongoing clinical operations projects. These individuals will work on a team of Power BI Engineers of all levels and will partner with technical and functional partners to meet the project needs. The ideal candidates should and in-depth expertise with Power BI (including DAX and Semantic Model Development), strong PySpark & Python coding experience, and experience with Databricks, Fabric, or a similar Spark platform. Additionally, strong communication skills are a must along with the proven ability to work with cross functional teams and stakeholders to drive project work (to be considered for a Lead level role, candidates must also have working experience leading other team members and their work). These are immediate, ongoing needs that will go until the end of 2025 with the possibility of extensions into 2026. These positions are based in LATAM and candidates are able to sit remotely in either Brazil or Chile.

REQUIRED SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE

- 5+ years of experience with Power BI development and engineering (DAX and semantic model development and deployment) - Strong hands on coding ability in PySpark and Python - Professional working experience with Databricks, Fabirc, or similar Spark platforms - Fair knowledge on the use of Azure Dev Ops (ADO) to manage repository and versions - Strong communication skills and experience engaging directly with business stakeholders and technical teams

NICE TO HAVE SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE

- Knowledge of Tabular and ALM tools to work on Semantic Model and automation - Experience working for a global company/ with a global team



Compensation :

$22/hr to $27/hr.

Exact compensation may vary based on several factors, including skills, experience, and education.

Benefit packages for this role will start on the 31st day of employment and include medical, dental, and vision insurance, as well as HSA, FSA, and DCFSA account options, and 401k retirement account access with employer matching. Employees in this role are also entitled to paid sick leave and/or other paid time off as provided by applicable law.

title: Platform Engineer
description:
About Us

Smarter Contact is a fast-growing SaaS company with a text and voice messaging communications platform enhanced by AI technologies. We serve real estate professionals across the US and are proud to be the market leader in this space. We're always looking for performance-driven team members to join our growing team.


The Role

We’re seeking a skilled Platform Engineer to join our engineering team and help build robust internal tools and systems that enhance development and operational capabilities. This role is crucial to developing and maintaining the infrastructure that powers our engineering efficiency.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Design and implement internal DevOps tools and automation systems
  • Develop and maintain configuration management systems across multiple environments
  • Create and maintain simulation environments for third-party integrations
  • Build and improve developer productivity tools and internal extensions
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand and address platform needs
  • Contribute to the architecture and design of internal tools and systems
  • Implement monitoring, logging, and observability solutions
  • Create a layered permissions admin panel to automate common support requests
  • Build reporting frameworks to query system data for financial and operational insights


Technical Requirements:

  • Strong experience with Google Cloud Platform (GCP) services and best practices
  • Proficient in TypeScript and modern JavaScript development
  • Experience building and maintaining Chrome extensions
  • Strong SQL knowledge and experience with database optimization
  • Experience with GraphQL API development and integration
  • Expertise in developing simulation/mock environments for third-party APIs
  • Familiarity with API integration patterns (REST, GraphQL, WebHooks)
  • Knowledge of DevOps practices and tools
  • Experience with configuration management and environment variable handling


Qualifications:

  • 7+ years of software engineering experience, with at least 2 years in platform or tooling engineering
  • Proven track record of building internal developer tools and automation systems
  • Strong understanding of software development lifecycle and CI/CD practices
  • Experience with communication APIs (e.g., Twilio)
  • Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail
  • Strong communication skills and ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams


Nice to Have:

  • Experience with Infrastructure as Code (IaC)
  • Familiarity with containerization and orchestration tools (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes)
  • Background in SaaS or cloud-native applications
  • Experience with monitoring and observability tools
  • Experience with CRM platform integrations, ideally HubSpot


We’re looking for someone who’s passionate about building tools that empower developers and improve engineering efficiency. If you enjoy creating solutions that make development workflows smoother and more reliable, we’d love to hear from you.

title: Senior Database Administrator (DBA)
description:
Job Title: Senior Database Administrator (DBA)

Location: Remote

Language Skills: Fluent in English, both written and spoken.

Overview:

We are seeking a highly experienced Senior Database Administrator (DBA) with a strong background in Oracle, MySQL, and SQL Server databases, as well as expertise in automation and scripting.

Responsibilities:

  • Database Management: Install, configure, and maintain Oracle, MySQL, and SQL Server databases in production, test, and development environments.
  • Performance Optimization: Monitor and optimize database performance to ensure high availability and reliability.
  • Backup and Recovery: Design and implement backup and recovery strategies to safeguard data integrity.
  • Automation: Develop and maintain scripts for database automation tasks, including backups, monitoring, and performance tuning.
  • Security: Implement and manage database security policies to protect sensitive data.
  • Issue Resolution: Diagnose and resolve database-related issues, providing support to application developers and other stakeholders.
  • Capacity Planning: Plan and manage database capacity to ensure scalability and performance.
  • Documentation: Create and maintain comprehensive documentation for database configurations, processes, and procedures.
  • Mentorship: Provide guidance and mentorship to junior DBAs and other team members.

Qualifications:

  • Education: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
  • Experience: Minimum of 10 years of experience as a DBA in a mission-critical production environment.
  • Technical Skills:
  • Proficiency in Oracle (versions 10g to 21c), MySQL, and SQL Server (versions 2000 to 2022).
  • Strong scripting skills in SQL/T-SQL, PL/SQL, PowerShell, and Linux/Unix shell scripting.
  • Experience with database management and monitoring tools such as Oracle Enterprise Manager and SQL Server Management Studio.
  • Knowledge of cloud services like AWS, Azure, and Oracle Cloud.
  • Familiarity with High Availability (HA) and Disaster Recovery (DR) solutions.
  • Certifications: Preferred certifications include Oracle Certified Professional (OCP), Microsoft Certified Database Administrator (MCDBA), and AWS Certified Database.
  • Soft Skills: Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal. Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment. Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
  • Language Skills: Fluent in English, both written and spoken.

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Experience with automation tools and frameworks.
  • Knowledge of database replication, clustering, and virtualization technologies.

title: Long-Term Ruby on Rails Development
description:
Our digital agency is looking to hire 3-5 Ruby on Rails developers to add to our team. Must be senior-level and have expert Ruby on Rails full-stack development experience.


  • Must have 5+ years of experience with Ruby on Rails development
  • Must have 5+ years of experience with PostgreSQL / MySQL databases
  • Must have strong experience working remotely
  • Must have excellent English communication skills


Please submit your resume and GitHub profile / portfolio to apply for this position.

title: HubSpot Project Manager
description:
About the Role


As a Project Manager at InboundAV, you’ll take the lead on client projects and internal initiatives—guiding them from conception to successful delivery. You’ll manage timelines, resources, and communications while offering strategic insight to improve workflows and outcomes. If you’re an organized, proactive, and people-savvy project leader with a passion for digital marketing and process optimization, we’d love to hear from you.


Key Responsibilities ✅


  • Lead Project Execution: Turn signed proposals and quotes into structured tasks and milestones within our project management tools.
  • Drive Project Success: Manage timelines, scope, budgets, and deliverables across multiple simultaneous projects.
  • Collaborate Cross-Functionally: Coordinate with internal teams (development, design, content, CRM) to ensure smooth execution.
  • Communicate Clearly: Maintain strong communication with Account Managers and clients, ensuring expectations are met or exceeded.
  • Run Effective Meetings: Conduct project status meetings and document progress, risks, and next steps.
  • Own the Tools: Ensure correct and consistent usage of project management systems and processes.
  • Share Knowledge: Lead cross-training sessions and help elevate the team’s overall project management capabilities.
  • Improve Internal Processes: Contribute to operational improvement initiatives, including the integration of emerging technologies like AI.
  • Lead by Example: Set the tone for excellence in project documentation, communications, and collaboration.


What We’re Looking For


﻿Technical Skills & Experience

  • Proven experience working on onboarding projects or implementation projects with HubSpot, as well as experience using different hubs, is required.
  • Proven experience managing digital marketing and/or web/software development projects.
  • Familiarity with Agile, Scrum, or Waterfall methodologies.
  • Proficient in project management tools (e.g., Asana, Trello, ClickUp, Monday.com).
  • Solid understanding of digital marketing practices (Inbound Marketing, CRM, marketing automation).
  • Ability to juggle multiple projects, prioritize tasks, and stay organized under pressure.


Soft Skills
